description.zh: 本課程將介紹電腦多媒體系統的發展。不同的媒體種類的處理以及相關的技術與概念，將在本課程中作介紹。其中包括電腦圖學，電腦動畫，電腦聲音與音樂，以及電腦視訊。商用的多媒體系統，以及研究階段的多媒體作家系統，也將涵蓋在課程的範圍之中。對多媒體的現今技術與未來，作系統性的討論與說明。課程大綱:多媒體系統簡介，多媒體市場，多媒體套裝，基本媒體--聲音，視訊，影像，動畫，文字；整合環境與套裝--書頁模式，連結模式，邏輯編排模式，展示模式；未來趨勢。
description.en: This course will look the multimedia development in computer science domain. Various media, such sound, video, graphic and animation, will be examined first to illustrate their usage in a computerized environment. Commercial packages will be employed to exercise the multimedia application in selected areas thereafter. Course Outline: Introduction to Multimedia; Multimedia Market; Multimedia Production Packages; Basic Media (Basics & Hardware/Software) - Audio, Video, Image, Animation, Text; Composition Environment/Packages -- Page-Oriented, Node-Link Oriented, Scripting, Demonstration; Future Trend.

description.zh: 1.機率理論基礎 2.隨機變數之產生 3.隨機過程基礎 4.Markovian 排隊系統分析5.Semi-Markovian 排隊系統分析 6.開放及封閉型排隊網路分析 7.隨機存取/網路系統之效能分析 8.系統輸入模式之建立 9.交換網路之模型建立與分析
description.en: 1.Probability theory review 2.Random variates generations 3.Introduction to stochastic processes 4.Simple Markovian queueing systems 5.Semi-Markovian queueing systems 6.Open and closed queueing networks 7.Performance evaluation of random access networks 8.Traffic modelling  9.Switching networks

name.zh: 數位廣播接收機之原理及實作
name.en: Principles and Implementation of Digital Audio Broadcasting

description.zh: 一、歐規數位廣播（DAB）簡介二、數位廣播相關基礎知識：中頻訊號取樣（Sampling Bandpass Signals）、數位中頻降頻器（Digital IF Down Converters）、快速富立葉轉換（FFT）之介紹、單頻網路（Single Frequency Network）、多路徑（Multi-path）之問題、及通道編碼（Channel Coding）之介紹三、數位廣播（DAB）接收機系統簡介四、正交頻域多工（OFDM）之解調變及數位廣播同步技巧介紹五、DQPSK之解調變、訊號交錯（Interleaving）、及能量分散（Energy Dispersal）六、穿刺迴旋碼（Punctured Convolutional Code）之解碼七、FIC（Fast Information Channel）及MSC（Main Service Channel）之內容介紹八、數位廣播之音訊解碼九、數位廣播之進階服務
description.en: 1. Introduction to Digital Audio Broadcasting (DAB) and Other Digital Broadcasting Systems2. Overview of DAB receiver3. Design issues of FR front end and digital IF 4. Introudction to ODFM and Survey of synchronization techniques 5. DQPSK demod, frequency interleaving, and energy dispersal6. Concept of punctured convolutional coding 7. Information in FIC (Fast Information Channel) and MSC (Main Service Channel)8. Audio decoder for DAB receiver 9. Brief introduction to CA (Conditional Access) and MOT (Multimedia Object Type) protocal

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹學生個人軟體程序的概念與技術，幫助學生建立相關的技能以提升其開發軟體的能力。透過原理與實作的結合，引導學生學習軟體專案計畫、追蹤、測量、與分析等方法，並學習如何使用這些方法來改善個人軟體開發的效能。課程內容包括下列主題：一、個人軟體程序策略二、個人軟體程序基準三、計劃I - 計劃的流程四、計劃II - 軟體規模測量五、計劃III - 軟體規模估算六、計劃IV - 資源與時程估算七、個人軟體程序測量八、設計與程式碼檢驗九、個人軟體程序擴展十、個人軟體程序應用
description.en: 英文概述English Description 	The objective of this course is to introduce the concepts and technologies of personal software process and help students build the skills required for doing better development work. In particular, students will learn comprehensive planning, tracking, measuring, and analysis methods and learn how to use these techniques to improve their personal performance in developing software projects. The course will cover the following topics: 1.The Personal Software Process Strategy 2.The Baseline Personal Process 3.Planning I - The Planning Process 4.Planning II - Measuring Software Size 5.Planning III - Estimating Software Size 6.Planning IV - Resources and Schedules Estimating7.Measurements in the Personal Software Process 8.Design and Code Reviews9.Scaling Up the Personal Software Process10.Using the Personal Software Process

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 課程中主要的訓練可分為三個方向：一、人為環境管理；二、自然環境管理；三、環境系統分析。在此規劃方向的考慮下，將會邀請專家學者進行相關主題的演講。參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Three categories are stressed in these basic training courses: the management of human environment, the management of natural environment, and the system analysis towards environment.  Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses.  The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation.  Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 探討都市環境問題以提升都市安全，舒適品質、整合都市計畫、環境工程、綠建築、景觀園藝之跨領域內涵。主要內容課程包括：1.總論 2.都市構造 3.都市計畫 4.都市生活與環境 5.都市能源問題 6.都市交通與環境問題 7.都市氣候與熱島化 8.都市水環境 9.都市綠化 10.都市循環型資源再生利用 11.都市防災 12.都市維生系統 13.都市景觀創造、舒適環境 14.綠建築-環境共生住宅 15.都市環境共生策略
description.en: The course is making a search for the urban environment problems to the aim of promoting the urban safety  and life quality, meanwhile integrates the contents of urban planning, environmental engineering, green building and horticulture. The contents of the course include:urban constitution, urban planning, urban life  and environment, urban environment issues,climate change, life system, resources recovery and urban virescence.

description.zh: 國際間基於永續發展之目標，及建立循環型體系之趨勢，各國均選擇適當區域來推動生態化工業，促進產業間投入與產出面之關聯性連結，進而從循環型產業擴展至生態都市及循環型城鄉與社會。本課程將配合國內環保科技園區推展現況及實際須求來授課, 內容包括國際循環型產業, 生態工業系統原則, 運作效益, 清潔生產,廢棄物資源化網路架構等。
description.en: Establishing Ecology Industry and recycle-oriented society has been a current trend in the world.  Starting from building up the linkage ofthe inputs and outputs between Industries, recycle-oriented concepts can be further expended to build eco-town and eco-city. The main purpose of  this course is to learn the Industrial Ecology, principals of Eco-Industrial Park, Pollution Prevention, Cleaner Production, Waste recycle and resource recovery networks, etc.

description.zh: 本課程著重在協助企業如何在國際間綠色浪潮的衝擊與永續發展三重盈餘之二十一世紀新經濟中競存，並能與全球永續發展的理想共存共榮。換言之，本課程主要是協助企業如何透過環境的議題，將原本可能的威脅課程轉換成機會。課程內容包括：企業環境管理與永續發展的內涵、企業環境風險管理與預防、整合性企業環境管理的做法、綠色行銷與永續消費、綠色產品設計、環境會計、環境資訊的揭露與報告、企業社會責任的內涵及做法，以及其他企業綠化的做法。
description.en: This course focuses on strategically assisting enterprises to improve their competitiveness through environmental issues while striving for sustainability in the 21st century. The contents of the course will be covering overview of corporate environmental management and sustainable development, corporate environmental risk management and prevention, green accounting, green marking and sustainable consumption, corporate social responsibility, corporate environmental disclosure and reporting, and some other subjects related to the greening of the business.

name.en: Monitoring and Analysis for Environmental Pollutants

description.zh: 本課程著重於環境污染物之微量監測與分析內容，此包括有機有毒物、重金屬之儀器分析原理、化學理論及分析方法。修習本課程宜有化學基礎。
description.en: The course introduces monitoring and analysis for environment pollutants. It focuses the micro quantity analysis based on chemical theory. Modern instruments with high sensitivity will be also discussed.

description.zh: 由於世界各國對自來水水質標準逐漸提高，因此，自來水高級處理已變成目前國際上飲用水研究之主要趨勢。此外在台灣，由於河川受污水下水道普及率低及工業污染之影響下，原水水質長久不佳。傳統處理程序已無法因應消費者之需求，高雄水質不佳即是最好例子。因此，本課程之重點嘉集中高級自來水之處理程序，如薄膜逆滲透、超過濾、為過濾、臭氧等高級氧化程序與有機物吸附等處理程序。
description.en: Because of the tightened regulation enacted by many countries, advanced drinking water treatment technology has been the research focus all around the world. In addition, in Taiwan, water resource, including surface and ground water, are seriously polluted due to industrial discharge and low sewerage system connection ratio. Traditional treatment processes, such as coagulation, sedimentation, filtration, are not enough for water purification for these deterioraated raw water gualities. Therefoore, this class will offer the opportunity to improve the knowledge for advanced drinking water treatment technology, including reverse osmosis, nanofiltration, ozone disinfection, GAC adsorption, and me.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

description.zh: 機械設計原理，機械之精密度與準確度，自動化機械構造分析，驅動進給與定位系統之合成與分析，結構件之靜動態分析，從規格開始之機械設計程序，個案研究等 。
description.en: Theory of machine design, Principles of precision and accuracy, Components of automatic machinery, Synthesis and analysis of feed drive and positioning system, Static and dynamic analysis of structure, Mechanical design process starting with machine specifications, Case study, etc.

name.zh: 微奈米量測系統與技術

description.zh: 微奈米量測工程技術為是現代科技發展之重要前瞻技術，它將探討有效尺寸在微奈米等級範圍之精密量測儀器與技術. 本課程將涵括下列各項現代精密量測主題:1.近代光電量測系統與技術2.量測統計原理3.量測信號處理4.三次元座標量測系統與技術5.雷射干涉系統與技術6.影像量測系統與技術7.微奈米量測系統與技術-干涉術、相位移術、調變術、光共焦 及   自動聚焦術8.微奈米量測系統與技術--掃瞄探針顯微鏡(SPM), STM, AFM 及   SNOM.9.奈米粉體量測系統與技術10.量測實驗11.小型量測儀器之專題製作
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the advanced systems and technology associated with micro- and nano-scale measurement. The subject includes the following subtopics:1.Modern opto-electro measurement systems and techniques2.Statistic principles for measurement3.Signal processing techniques4.Three-dimensional measurement systems and techniques5.Laser interferometric metrology and systems6.Image processing techniques for metrology7.Micro and nano-measurement systems and techniques (I) -   Moire interferometry, phase shifting, signal modulation,   confocal and auto-focusing techniques.8.Micro- and nano-measurement systems and techniques (II) -   SPM, STM, AFM and SNOM.9.Nano-particle measurement systems and techniques10.Student laboratory/practices11.Team project work for design and fabrication of    small-scaled measurement instrument

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹微處理系統的介面設計。其中包括記憶體介面，一般的輸出輸入介面以及CPLD/FPGA介面。由於CPLD與FPGA大量應用在嵌入式系統中，如何利用微處理器的彈性軟體設計，搭配CPLD/FPGA的高速運算能力，將是本課程的重點。
description.en: Interfacing between microprocessor and peripheral will be discussed in this course.  The interfacing technique includes memory interface, general peripheral and CPLD/FPGA devices.  A large number of industrial applications have applied CPLD/FPGA into their design.  This course will also focus on integrating of microcontroller and CPLD/FPGA devices by taking advantages of the flexibility of microcontroller and high speed calculation capability of CPLD/FPGA devices.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 先修課程：近代物理。 1.晶體結構與生長 2.晶格振動與聲子   3.能帶理論 4.光電材料基本特性 5.接面理論 6.發光元件   7.檢光元件 8.電荷耦合元件（CCD）   9.液晶顯示（LCD）
description.en: 1.Crystal structures and growth 2.Lattice vibration and phonon 3.Energy-band theory 4.Basic properties of photonic methods 5.Junction theory 6.Light-emitting devices   7.Pgotodetectors 8.Changed-coupled devices   9.Liguid crystal display

name.en: Techniques and Applications of Films Analysis

description.zh: 先修課程：光學薄膜設計與應用。主要的項目包含：表面電漿現象、膜層厚度、鍍膜工程，表面形貌觀察、光譜分析、橢圓偏光術，光電性質、表面粗糙度、膜厚、附著力、內應力等膜之特性分析。
description.en: Surface plasmon phenomena, films thickness determination, coating technology, surface profile, optical spectrum analysis, ellipsometry, optical-electrical properties, surface roughness, adhesion and stress analysis.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   1.線性系統轉換 2.簡介電磁原理 3.簡介基礎光學（幾何光學、繞射、傅氏光學、光纖及雷射入門）4.光資訊處理 5.Joint轉換處理器  6.光類比神經網路 7.光輸入設備 8.光輸出設備 9.光記憶設備 10.光資訊處理工具 11.光應用實例   12.光資訊市場
description.en: 1.Linear system transformation 2.Introdution to electromagnetic theory 3.Intorduction to optics（Geometrical optics, diffraction, Fourier optics, fiber optics, and laser）4.Optical information processing   5.Joint transform processor 6.Opticsl neural network   7.Optical input derives 8.Optical output derives   9.Optical memory derives 10.Optical information processing tool  11.Applications（Select five topics）12.Introduction to the optical market

description.zh: 應用光學：使學生了解”光機電整合”系統中光學部份的基本原理光系統元件特性與應用、內容包括；幾何光學，雷射光束傳播，干涉繞射理論，偏極光特性，電光效應，聲光效應，光纖的導波特性，光纖在感測上的應用。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to provide student of fundamental concepts, techniques and applications of otics in a Opto-Electronic integrated system.It may include the theories of geometric options, the propagation of laser beam,the difraction and interference of light,the characteristis of coherence and polarization, the effents of the Electro-Optic, Magneto-optic modulation,the optical properties of waveguide and optic-fibre,and the applications of optical fibre sensor.

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.視覺與色彩 3.陰極射線管顯示器 4.電漿顯示器 5.液晶顯示器 6.電致發光顯示器 7.場發射顯示器 8.有機發光顯示器
description.en: 1.Introduction2.Sight and color3.Cathode-ray tube(CRT)4.Plasma panel display(PDP)5.Liquid crystal display(LCD)6.Electrolumisence display(ELP)7.Field emission display(FED)8.Organic light emitting device(OLED)

description.zh: 繞射光學元件是基於光波繞射的原理，以VLSI技術為加工方法，研究如何利用繞射現象設計光學元件來實現各種光學功能。繞射光學元件可以應用在改良光學系統的像差，為特定的波長實現聚光、分光等功能以取代傳統的光學透鏡、分光鏡等，此外利用傅光原理製作出傳統的光學元件無法實現的功能，在近代的光學系統、尤其是微光學系統佔有極重要的地位。本課程中，我們將討論其基本原理、設計方法、以及應用。主要課程內容為：(1)光學繞射原理(2)傅式光學概論(3)繞射光學元件介紹(4)性能分析方法(5)繞射光學元件之設計方法(6)繞射光學元件之應用(7)繞射光學元件之製作
description.en: Diffractive optical element (DOE) is based on optical wavefront diffraction on a phase profile that is commonly generated by VLSI techniques. DOE's can be applied on conventional optical systems as well as advanced opto-electronic systems. In this course, we will discuss in detail the basic pricioples, design methods, and others about DOE's. The following topics will be introduced:(1)Introduction to Diffraction theory(2)Overview of Fourier optics(3)Diffractive optical elements (DOE's)(4)Performance evaluation of DOE's(5)Design methods for DOE's(6)Applications of DOE's(7)Fabrication tecjniqies of DOE's

description.zh: (1)分波多工系統簡介(2)SBS效應(3)EDFA(光放大器)原理與特性(4)EDFA增益等化(5)DWDM MUX/DeMUX(6)光信號非線性效益(7)類比分波多工系統(8)數位分波多工系統
description.en: (1)Introduction (2)Stimulated Brillouin Scattering (3)EDFA principles (4)EDFA gain flattening (5)DWDM MUX/DeMUX (6)Nonlinear effect (7)analog WDM (8)Digital WDM

description.zh: 探討PN接面之特性，短通道效應，表通道技術原理，費米能階等基本元件物理，及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micre CMOS device,characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative hpysical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

name.zh: 光纖有線電視固網信號傳輸系統
name.en: Fiber system for CATV, fixed network

description.zh: (1)光纖電纜混合系統(2)個人通訊系統(3)光纖電話系統(4)光纖電纜混合電話系統(5)有線電視固網DWDM系統(6)信號間非線性作用(7)類比數位通道的干擾(8)脈衝雜訊
description.en: (1)Wire Access in HFC Systems (2)Personal Communication Systems (3)Optical Fiber-Based Phone Systems (4)Hybrid-Fiber-Coax BAsed Phone Systems (5)A Hybrid DWDM System for CATC & Fixed Network System (6)Nonlinear Interaction Between Optical Signaals (7)Crosstalk From Analoy Channels to Digital Channel (8)Clipping-Induced Impulse Noise

name.en: Principle and designing of semiconductor lighting

description.zh: (1)半導體物理與發光原理(2)半導體材料特性(3)元件結構設計(4)元件構裝技術(5)應用與發展
description.en: (1) Semiconductor physics and lighting principle (2) Characteristics of Semiconductor material (3) Structure designing of device (4) Package technology of device (5)Application and development

description.zh: (1)簡介 (2)光的偏振 (3)異向介質中的光波傳播特性 (4)Jones矩陣法 (5)液晶顯示器(6)液晶顯示器特性 (7)液晶空間光調制器 (8)液晶顯示器應用
description.en: (1)Introduction (2) Polarization representation (3) Optical wave in Anistropic media (4) Jones Matrix Method (5) Liquid crystal displays (6) Properties of liquid crystal display (7) Liquid Crystal Spatial Light Modulators (8) Applications

description.zh: (1)雷射基本概念 (2)電磁場與物質交互作用 (3)物質能階結構 (4)光在介質中的傳播 (5)光學共振腔 (6)泵浦過程 (7)穩態雷射性質 (8)瞬態雷射性質(含Q-開關及鎖模等) (9)雷射系統(氣體、固體、半導體雷射等) (10)雷射的應用(1)雷射基本概念 (2)電磁場與物質交互作用 (3)物質能階結構 (4)光在介質中的傳播 (5)光學共振腔 (6)泵浦過程 (7)穩態雷射性質 (8)瞬態雷射性質(含Q-開關及鎖模等) (9)雷射系統(氣體、固體、半導體雷射等) (10)雷射的應用
description.en: (1)Introductory concepts (2)Interaction of radiation with matters (3)Energy levels in materials (4)Propagation of light through media (5)Optical resonators (6)Pumping processes (7)Continuous wave laser behavior (8)Transient laser behavior (9)Various lasers (10)Laser applications

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 幫助學生認識一般科技文章以及科技論文語法、文體、句子結構等，並加強英文口頭表達之能力。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生瞭解質性研究的理論基礎、相關研究與實際應用。課程內容包含質性研究導論、質性研究過程與步驟、質性研究設計、質性研究方法論與技術、譯碼的程序、質性資料蒐集、質性資料分析、案例解析、質性研究報告撰寫、質性研究在創新設計研究上的應用。
description.en: The course is to help students understand the theory，practice and implications of qualitative research. The content covers an overview of qualitative research, the steps in the process of qualitative research, qualitative research designs, qualitative research methodology and methods, coding procedures, qualitative data collection, qualitative data analysis, qualitative research report writing, case studies, implications of qualitative research in the field of study on innovation and design.

description.zh: 進階設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行設計發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的體驗。本學期主要學習目標，幫助每一位同學有效完成研究計畫的審核。
description.en: Advanced Design project in studies, history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further design presentation. Efficient experience exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。 Hence, students are required to finish and pass the accessment concerning detailed research scheme.

description.zh: 本課程旨在以個別與小組合作模式，訓練學生通曉設計開發流程，以執行設計專案。涵蓋產品、家具與室內設計、數位互動設計….等。藉由實務案例的運作，及兼顧產業與組織之需求，以體現產業與社會文化面的問題與解決對策。本課程又以培育學生具備專業設計師之設計企劃提案與概念發想能力，以及學生使用設計工具之能力。
description.en: The goal of Advanced Design (II) is to train, under supervision, students in strategic areas of the product development process. In these projects, the students work alone or in groups. The projects are usually based on problems defined within different branches of industry and social sectors. Project work is usually done under realistic conditions, in collaboration with different industrial companies or public institutions. Students can contribute to this reality by developing sensible and usable products and systems which include qualities that speak to the heart and mind of people. We educate students as designers to have an open mind on both conceptual ideas and detailed realistic design solutions in order to develop higher quality products. Another important focus area of this course is to improve the students' capabilities in the use of modern design tools.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 課程內容包括擴散原理、兩相之間的質傳理論，亂流的質量傳遞，涉及化學反應的質傳，同時發生質量與熱量的傳遞，以及多成分的擴散現象。
description.en: Topics covered include theory of diffusion, interphase mass transfer theory, mass transfer in turbulent flow, mass transfer with chemical reaction, simultaneous mass and heat transfer, multicomponent diffusion.

description.zh: 反應工程是在商業規模之考慮下對化學反應開發利用之相關工程活動。其目的在成功的設計和操作化學反應器，並使化學工程在工程專業中成為一個獨特的支系。此高等反應工程是延續大學部己學習在均相中有關之簡單觀念及理論，並推展到非均相較複雜系統之設計及操作上。學生在修習此課後，對於較複雜之反應器有清晰及整體之概念。
description.en: Under commercial scale consideration, chemical reaction engineering is that engineering concerning the exploitiaton of chemical reactions Its goal is the successful design and operation of chemical reactors and it sets chemical engineering apart as a distinct branch of the engineering profession. This aduanced chemical reaction engineering is a continuative study of simple idea and principle for homogeneous systems and extended to heterogeneous and more complex systems for design and operation. After study in this course, the student can obtain clear and unified coucept of complex reactor systems.

name.zh: 高分子材料與複合材料

description.zh: 授課內容包括高分子及複合材料的製程、結構及性質等綜合知識，首先介紹機械混練與接枝共聚合等基本製程方法，並探討交穿網狀高分子合膠材料，以及含浸顆粒狀、纖維狀、板狀等強化高分子複合材料的結構形態與工程性質之相關原理。
description.en: Synthesis, morphology and engineering behavior of polymer and composite materials. Mechanical blend alloys, block and graft copolymers, interpenetrating polymer networks, polymer impregnated particulate, fiber and sheet-reinforce polymeric composites are emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程將基本物理化學原理應用在材料科學上，探討電子組態、化學鍵及晶體結構間之關係。內容包括晶體結構、X 光繞射分析、相平衡、材料之光學及電學性質及材料表面之鑑定及分析。
description.en: This subject covers the basic principles of physical chemistry and shows how they apply in describing the behavior of the solid state. The relationship between electronic structure, chemical bonding and crystal surface is developed. Attention is also given to characterization of atomic and molecular arrangements in materials as well as quantum optical and electrical effects in nanoscale materials.

description.zh: 利用單元介紹的方式，將生物化學、微生物學、分子生物學、基因工程等原理，應用在微生物或蛋白質品種改良上，並介紹生物活性物質，如氨基酸、抗生素、免疫體、酵素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、抗體等之製造方法。
description.en: Biotechnology applications in mutant microbial and protein productions are to be introduced based on the knowledge of biochemistry, microbiology, molecular biology, and genetic engineering, etc. This course also introduces the productions of some living blocks, such as amino acids, antibodies, enzymes, hormone, proteins, lipids, etc.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹一系列的生物分子及這些生物分子所扮演的角色。課程從認識細菌、植物、動物細胞及各種細胞胞器開始，接著探討蛋白質、酵素、DNA、RNA結構和功能及他們在生命中的重要性。再論及DNA複製及轉錄和RNA轉譯成蛋白質的重要性及機制。PCR和DNA重組技術的重要性是安排在最後來介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce a series of biomaterials and their functions. Begins from bacterial, plant, and animal cells and the differences between these cell organs. To learn of DNA, RNA, proteins, and enzymes base on their structures and functions. The phenomena of DNA replication and translation, and RNA translation will be studied. The PCR method and DNA recombinant technology also included in this course.

name.en: Design and Analysis of Computer Algorithms

description.zh: 1. 數學基礎 1.1 函數成長率之漸近性質 1.2 遞迴關係之解        1.3 數學歸納法 2. 基本分析技巧 2.1 計算複雜度之上下限2.2 最差情況分析及平均情況分析 2.3 動態平均分析 3. 基本設計技巧 3.1 分擊法 3.2 貪婪法 3.3 動態規劃 3.4 隨機演算法 4. 計算複雜度 4.1 資訊理論證明法 4.2 對抗式證明法 4.3 問題之線性轉換 4.4 完全NP
description.en: 1. Mathematical background 1.1 Asymptotic growth rate of functions 1.2 Solving recurrence relations 1.3 Mathematical induction 2. Basic analysis techniques 2.1 Computational complexities -- lower bounds and upper bounds 2.2 Worst case analysis and average case analysis 2.3 Amortized analysis 3. Basic Design Paradigms 3.1 Divide and conquer 3.2 Greedy methods 3.3 Dynamic programming 3.4 Probabilistic algorithms 4. Computational Complexity 4.1 Information-theoretic arguments 4.2 Adversary arguments 4.3 Linear reduction of problems 4.4 NP-completeness

description.zh: 1. 程序同步 2. 同作機制 3. 虛擬記憶體 4. 分散式系統 5.分散式同作控制   6.電腦安全 7. 排程模式
description.en: 1. Process synchronization 2. Concurrency Mechanisms 3. Virtual memory 4. Distributed Systems 5. Distributed Concurrency Control 6. Queuing Models

description.zh: 隨著台灣農工型態的轉變以及越來越高的生活品質要求,地下水所扮演的角將日益重要,地下水的領域涵蓋水量,水質及防災三方面,修習此一學科,可以了解地下水水文及水力學之基本原理,進而掌握地下水水理與污染傳輸之特性,以作為規劃與管理地下水資源之依據.
description.en: Theory and application of groundwater flow modeling,focusing on MODFLOW.Numerical methods.Discretization and boundaries.Parameterization and calibration.Problems and case-histories.

description.zh: 本課程提供理工學者撰寫科技論文之英文寫作技巧與指導，內容包括：扼要複習英文文法，詳細說明撰寫英文研究報告或論文時常犯的錯誤，深入討論標準英文寫作風格與修辭原則，提供簡易而有效的實作原則以提昇科技論文的可讀性。
description.en: This course develops a curriculum providing students with an English writing skill and direction focused on technical essays, including the followings : 1. Concise review of English grammars2. Frequent writing mistakes of essays or reports3. Deep discussion concerning standard English writing style and rhetoric principles4. Offering simple and practical writing principles to increase the readability of technology essays.

description.zh: 本課程提供理工學者撰寫科技論文之英文寫作技巧與指導，內容包括：扼要複習英文文法，詳細說明撰寫英文研究報告或論文時常犯的錯誤，深入討論標準英文寫作風格與修辭原則，提供簡易而有效的實作原則以提昇科技論文的可讀性。
description.en: This course develops a curriculum providing students with an English writing skill and direction focused on technical essays, including the followings : 1. Concise review of English grammars2. Frequent writing mistakes of essays or reports3. Deep discussion concerning standard English writing style and rhetoric principles4. Offering simple and practical writing principles to increase the readability of technology essays.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。   1.多模光纖實驗 2.單模光纖實驗 3.位置量測實驗 4.Doppler測速實驗 5.全像術 6.全像干涉術 7.疊紋術 8.疊紋干涉術 9.電腦輔助雷射切割程式製作 10.雷射切割實驗 11.快速原型三D加工NC程式製作 12.雷射輔助快速原型製造 13.基本光電週邊實習 13-1.光資訊輸入：數位相機、掃瞄器、影像捕抓 13-2.光資訊輸出 14.光資訊儲存實習 14-1.MO的用法與控制 14-2.CD/RW的用法與控制 15.基本光資訊處理實習 15-1.光計算圖形辨認實習 15-2.MRI醫學影像處理
description.en: 1.Experiment on multi-mode optical fiber 2.Experiment on single-mode optical fiber 3.Position measurement 4.Doppler velocity measurement 5.Holography 6.Holography interferometry 7.Moire method 8.Moire interferometry 9.Computer assisted programming for laser cutting 10.Experiment of laser cutting 11.NC programming for the three dimensional fabricator of rapid prototype 12.Laser assisted rapid prototyping 13.Basic Electro-optical peripheral  13-1.Optical Input devices：digital camera、scanner、Image capturer  13-2.Optical output devices：LCD display、LED display、3D-TV display 14.Optial information storage  14-1.Usage and control of MO  14-2. Usage and control of CD/RW 15.Dasic optical information processing  15-1.Optical compating and pattern recognition  15-2.MRI medical image processing

description.zh: 近軸光學、光線追跡、賽德像差理論、色差校正、鏡頭設計原理、消色差雙片鏡組、場曲校正、三片式鏡組、目鏡與無焦系統、反射式光學系統設計、數位相機取像鏡頭設計專題、變焦鏡頭設計專題
description.en: Paraxial Optics, Ray Tracing, Seidel Aberrations, Chromatic Aberrations, Principles of Lens Design, Achromatic Doublet Objective, PetzvalLenses, Triple Cooke Lens, Eyepiece and Afocal System, Catadioptric System, Special topic on Digital Still Camera, Special topic on Zoom Lens

description.zh: 專題演講或書報討論
description.en: In this course, we will invite speakers from the academia, industry and government to lectures on topics in computer science and information engineering.

description.zh: 本課程針對網際服務應用軟體(Web-based Applications)特性，透過原理與實作的結合，引導學生有效統合軟體工程原理、觀念、方法、與技術，以建立網際服務軟體工程程序(Web-based software engineering process)，開發高品質網際服務軟體。課程內容包括下列主題：一、網際服務軟體工程概論二、網際服務應用系統架構三、網際服務軟體開發程序四、網際服務軟體程序框架五、網際服務系統規劃與分析六、網際服務軟體設計七、網際服務軟體測試八、網際服務軟體管理九、元件式網際服務應用軟體開發十、服務導向式網際服務應用軟體開發
description.en: The objective of this course is to provide students with full knowledge and technologies of Web-based software engineering. In particular, students will learn about the practices, concepts, methods, and techniques for producing high quality Web-based software. The course will cover the following topics: 1.Introduction to Web-based Software Engineering2.The Structure of Web-based Systems3.The Software Process for Web-based Applications4.The General Process Framework for Web-based Applications5.Formulating and Analyzing Web-based Systems6.Design of Web-based Applications7.Testing of Web-based Applications8.Management Issues of Web-based Applications9.Component-Based Web Application Development Approach10.Service-Oriented Web Application Development Approach

name.zh: 邊坡穩定分析與個案討論

description.zh: 坡地工程概論、環境影響評估、坡地工址調查、坡地水土保持技術、邊坡穩定分析、護坡工程設計與分析、坡地監測系統之設置及運用、坡地災害緊急應變處理、坡地災害減災措施、坡地災害案例分析。
description.en: This course covers methods slope stability analyses, selection of methods of analysis and strength parameters, field investigation for landslide problems; design strategies; uncertainties in slope analysis and quantitative risk analysis; landslip preventive and protective measures; slope monitoring systems, and various case studies。

description.zh: 人工智慧之軟式運算技術，包括基因演算法、類神經網路等，是向生物及自然演化現象取法的數種機器學習技術，提供模仿生物決策思維的系統分析方法，也開啟其於土木工程領域系統決策分析應用的研究方向。近年來電腦資訊科技的突飛猛進，催化人工智慧領域軟式運算技術的快速發展，並融入或然率之概念，發展非唯一解類神經網路、機率類神經網路、壓縮類神經網路及贅餘基因演算法等於土木工程領域之各種應用。課程中並配合作業、論文研討、報告及實際軟體介紹、操作以幫助學習。
description.en: Soft computing methods of artificial intelligence, including genetic algorithm and artificial neural network, are biologically inspired machine learning technology.  A genetic algorithm, which is a computational model that imitates the process of Darwinian evolution, is emerging as a powerful tool in optimization and design problems.  Neural networks provide massively parallel computational models and adaptive systems with properties of noise and fault tolerance as well as learning capacity.  All these classes of methods share some basic characteristics that are inherently different than those of traditional mathematically based engineering analysis.  This course will also introduce the recent progress on application of soft computing methods in civil engineering.

description.zh: 應用統計及機率推估水文變數及過程之不確定性，其中包含極端事件、模擬、取樣、預測及統計與機率理論。
description.en: Application of statistics and probability to uncertainty in the description, measurement, and analysis of hydrologic variables and processes, including extreme events, error models, simulation, sampling, prediction, statistics or probability theory.

description.zh: 1.X光之本質 2.晶体幾何及倒置晶格3.晶體立體投影 4.X光繞射原理5.X光繞射實驗方法(繞射儀，Laue照相法，粉末法) 6.X光繞射之應用(包括晶體結構之鑑定，晶格常數之量測，相圖測定，序化一非序化轉換及化學成分分析等)
description.en: 1.Properties of X-Ray 2.Crystallography and Reciprocal Lattice 3.Projections of Crystals 4.Principles of X-Ray Diffraction 5.Experimental Methods (Diffractometer Methods, Powder Photographs and Laue Pholtographs)6.Applications of X-ray Diffraction (Orientation and Quality of Single Crystal,  Structure of Polycrystalline Aggregates, Determine of Crystal Structure and Precise Parameter Measurements, Chemical Analysis, Phase Transformations etc.)

description.zh: 本課程主要是開設給已經修過"粉末冶金學"的學生，對粉末冶金製程與粉末冶金技術的應用有更進一步的認識。課程的安排在製程方面，強調粉末特性對粉末冶金製程的影響，成形模具的設計，燒結理論與現象，燒結体的後處理等。應用方面以本國現有的粉末冶金工廠與其製品為主，例如：機械零件、超硬工具材料、磁性材料、電接點材料、摩擦材料等製程的講述。
description.en: This course is a special topics of  Topic of powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 介紹高級發光材料及原理
description.en: special topics of luminescent materials

description.zh: 介紹晶體的各種完美結構，缺陷結構的形成與各種物理特性的相互關係，電子的波動與粒子之性質，電子於自由電子能量井，固態中行為與能帶觀念之介紹，固態材料的鬆散行為，固態的介電性質。
description.en: An introduction to Solid-State Physics in materials science.

description.zh: 寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為.
description.en: introduction to gem identification

description.zh: 相圖及相變化熱力學,多元溶液及部份莫耳熱力學。以熱力學分析.設計及電腦模擬冶金方法。
description.en: The thermodynamics of phase diagrams and phase transformations. Solution thermodynamics of multi-compoment and partial molar properties. Applications of thermodynamics to the analysis, design and computer simulation of metallurgical processes.

description.zh: 探討物質表面之化學結構及性質，相關的理論基礎及技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the basic theories and techniques about the chemical structure and properties of material's surface.

description.zh: 本課程是針對自然界因地質作用所引發的地質災害進行研究，尤其著重於各種地質災害的調查與分析。根據衛星影像與航照判釋、現場地質勘查與分析以及各種潛在危險災害發生率與影響性評估方法，對各種地質災害類型依發生頻率及潛在危險性，討論在區域開發上之限制與事前的整治防範。同時也分析各個地質災害案例，了解人與自然環境的互動關係。
description.en: In the past ten years, There have always been natural earth processes that are hazardous to people of Taiwan. Natural disasters such as typhoon, earthquakes, river flooding hazards, landslides, debris flow hazards and subsidences caused loss of life or property damage. These disasters made people realize that the natural processes that produce natural disasters must be recognized. They must be avoided where possible, and their threat to human life and property must be minimized. In fact, natural hazards are nothing more than natural processes. They become hazards only when people live or work in areas where these processes occur naturally. The purpose of this course is hoped to serve some methods to identify and analysis potentially hazardous processes. It is also provided some concepts and training to formulate various alternatives to avoid or minimize the threat to human life or property.

description.zh: 本課程介紹水文地質的一般原理、概念和分析方法及地下水在實用上的一些問題。主要內容有: 水的來、源分、佈與循環、地下水的賦存、地下水的物理性質及化學成分、地下水運動的基本規律、地下的地質作用、地下水的補給、排泄與徑流、地下水資源概況，與地下水有關的環境問題，地下水與工程開發的工程地質問題，水文地質調查概要等。
description.en: The content of this class includes general principles, concepts of hydrological geology and analyzing methods for practical problem related to this subject. It includes: origin of water, distribution and circulation, reserve of underground water, physical and chemical properties of underground water and the relationship between hydrology and engineering geology.  It also discuss environmental concerns of engineering to the hydrology system.

description.zh: 1.原子及其結構 2.化學鍵 3.晶體結構原理 4.結構缺陷、成分與穩定性 5.鍵                                          結與物理性質 6.晶體與光 7.氧化物晶體化學 8.矽酸鹽晶體化學 9.金屬晶                                          體化學 10.高分子結晶化學
description.en: 1.Atoms and their structure 2.Chemicals bonds 3.Principles of crystal structures                                          4.Bonding and physical properties 5.Crystal defects、composition and stability                                          6.Crystal and light 7.Crystal chemistry of oxide 8.Crystal chemistry of silicate                                          9.Crystal chemistry of metal 10.Crystal chemistry of polymer

name.en: Special Topics on Characteristics of Polymers

description.zh: 介紹高分子分子結構、型態學、流變學、化學性質、熱性質、機械、電學及光學等特性之分析方法及實例。
description.en: This course will cover the examples of analysis of the mechanical, thermal, electrical, optical and chemical properties, and the structure, morphology, and rheology of polymers.

description.zh: 課程內容包高等控制策略，多變數控制系統，數位取樣，數位控制系統，模式識別，狀態變數。
description.en: An introduction to advanced control algorithms, multivariable process control, digital sampling, digital control system, model identifications, state variable.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹專業英文論文的寫作格式，以及文件編修的技巧，且用深入淺出的例子作為示範，並輔以實際寫作練習與錯誤訂正。學員學習研究論文組織寫作﹐包含修改本身論文結構之基本技巧﹐正確組織文章的各個片段﹐避免口語用字寫字的陋習﹐使所作之文章能掌握其涵意﹐亦即能更有效率的利用英文寫出科技論文之佳作。
description.en: The goal of English Technical Writing is to help students developing the writing skills through the manipulation of scientific and technical data. Students will learn a variety of rhetorical principles that guide the writing process, apply these principles to scientific and technical writing, and write papers in their own academic fields. Lectures on the writing principle, students' presentations on the reading sections and follow-up activities, pair and individual work on writing practice will be the major activities in the class.

name.zh: 半導體材料檢測技術及原理

description.zh: 本課程將探討半導體材料之表面化學性質之分析技巧、以及界面和分子間引力之量測方法、表面形態分析、晶相結構分析以及電磁性質量測之技術和其原理。並配合半導體旋轉塗佈機和濺鍍機所備製之薄膜﹐實際操作FTIR顯微鏡、原子力顯微鏡、微量材料流變儀。
description.en: This course will present the techniques and their corresponding theories on the surface property measurements including chemical information, stress analysis, morphology, crystalline structure and intermolecular forces between interfaces. The course also includes a practical training on the FTIR microscope, atomic force microscope, reology meter on the semiconductor materials.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在於強化並提昇學生在中、英文學術與專業論文寫作上的能力與表達。內容包括：1.介紹工程研究的本質及科學家的思考邏輯；2.相關文獻資料的選用與閱讀；3.研究主題的寫作計畫與大綱；4.論文格式、寫作各項要求、段落銜接、病句分析及文法修辭等；5.好文章的組成要素，譬如是否精確報導事實？如何進一步討論數據測量的是非、新舊、優劣？以及是否解決問題的重點等？6.研究計畫書及論文的評審與出版；7.其他注意事項，含如何運用電腦媒體及網路製作圖表、簡報、履歷表、求職信、推薦函以及正確且合理使用他人的著作資料等。
description.en: 1.Nature of engineering research, thinking and logic of scientists.2.Reading and understanding literature and problems in research.3.Planning process and preliminary outlines before a scientific writing.4.Style, format, writing requirements, paragraph transition, sentence coherence, and grammar rhetoric for a scientific paper.5.Key elements of a fine paper, i.e. being a precise report of facts, being a concise interpretation of measured data and their comparisons and analysis, and being a new finding or solution for a research problem.6.Submission, reviewing and publication of research proposals and papers.7.Tips on writing with the aid of computer tools and websites include the making of tables, graphs, oral presentations, resumes, and placement letters.

description.zh: 本課程是介紹基因工程學之基礎知識。內容包括寄主細胞的選擇：細菌、酵母菌、真菌等微生物或昆蟲細胞、哺乳類動物細胞等動物細胞或者是植物細胞。聚合連鎖反應、基因轉殖、質體轉型、病毒轉換、基因槍等常用的基因工程學之方法。
description.en: This course is to introduce basic knowledge of genetic engineering, including the selection of host cells, bacterial, yeast, fungi, insect cell, mammalian cell, or plant cell. The powerful methods of genetic engineering, including polymerase chain reaction (PCR), gene clone, plasmid transformation, virus transduction, and biolistics are also introduced in this course.

name.zh: 細菌生理學與生化工程

description.zh: 細菌為基因工程中最常用的寄主細胞。在生化反應器中扮演一個個小反應器，生產人類所要的產物。這個小反應器中的變化當然影嚮產物的製程。本課程即是介紹與生化工程相關之細菌生理。包含生長速率控制、嚴酷環境回應、熱休克回應、DNA修復等。
description.en: Bacterial is the most common host cell of genetic engineering. It plays a tiny reactor in bioreactor to generate our desired products. The change of this tiny reactor, physiology, has influence on the process. This course is to introduce bacterial physiology related to biotechnology. It includes growth rate control, stringent response, heat shock response, DNA repair and so on.

description.zh: 1. 交流電機模型2. 磁場導向控制3. 電流型變頻器控制4. 電壓型變頻器控制5. 控制器參數調整6. 交流電機轉速估測
description.en: 1. MODELLING OF AC DRIVES2. VECTOR CONTROL OF AC DRIVES3. CURRENT SOURCE INVERTER CONTROL4. VOLTAGE SOUR INVERTER CONTROL5. PARAMETER TUNING OF CONTROLLER6. SPEED ESTIMATION OF AC DRIVES

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Paper Presentation of special topics on education, giving lectures, and group meeting.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

name.en: Administration of Vocational and Technological School

description.zh: 本課程在探討學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能等，並以技職學校作為討論主軸。
description.en: This course is to guide students to explore the historical background of the theories of school administration; theories of school social system; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

description.zh: 本課程之開設旨再協助學生了解質化研究典範之特質，熟悉質化訪談的相關技巧與資料分析之方法。其內容包括：質化研究之特質 、研究設計與樣本選擇、質化研究之信度、效度與研究倫理、質化訪談法與訪談經驗分享、資料分析之技巧、質化研究實例介紹，以及質化研究之寫作。
description.en: The course is designed to make a brief introduction about qualitative research. The contents include: (a) the characteristics of qualitative research ; (b)  its research design and sampling; (c) the validity, reliability and ethics; (d) the techniques  of qualitative research; and(e) the writing and evaluation of qualitative research  proposal and thesis.

name.zh: 技職教育評鑑方案規劃
name.en: Planning of Evaluation Project in Technical -Vocational Educ

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育評鑑方案規劃領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: The selected topic course is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in planning of evaluation project.

name.zh: 模糊理論在災害管理之應用
name.en: Application of Fuzzy Theory in Disaster Management

description.zh: 模糊理論基本觀念模糊數學模糊多屬性決策分析應用實例分析
description.en: The course introduces fuzzy theory and related models to improve the effectiveness of disaster management. The main content includes concepts of logic, fuzzy set, fuzzy relation, fuzzy math, fuzzy logic, calculation principles, and some important performance evaluation methods and application algorithms which are often used with fuzzy theory. The course may help students not only touching the key concepts of fuzzy theory, but also independently doing deeper research in fuzzy, evaluation, and management field.

description.zh: 全適性設計專題在探討多元化使用族群適用的產品、環境、和溝通，以尊重人性福址為前提之設計創新思維，開啟新產品開發策略做法，滿足各種各樣的使用者需求。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認詮釋性設計思維方法與實務。
description.en: It is a worldwide design movement that wants to make products, environments and communication usable to the greatest extent possible by the broadest number of users including children, older adults, people with disabilities, people of atypical size or shape, people who are ill of injured, and people inconvenienced by circumstances. Universal design respects human diversity and promotes inclusion of all people in all activities of life. It is not an identifiable style but a way of thinking about the design process. Universal design defines good design as attractive and user-friendly.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer-aided-design. By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer-aided-design software.

description.zh: 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動, 研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之研  究.
description.en: This course provides study of design-ergonomics related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. With emphasis on technology integration, ergonomics proactive and methodology, the course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

description.zh: 1.探究Crystal Cycle 景氣週期循環2.探究光電產業關鍵零組件與材料產業的內容與現況3.熟悉與運用Porter五力分析、SWOT分析、與鑽石分析之研究工具4.趨勢量化研究工具SPSS之熟悉與運用5.技術創新機制模型之研發與運用6.專利申請之運用
description.en: 1.explore the Crystal Cycle of prosperity period2.	explore the contents and current of the key component and material in the Electro-Optical Industry3.know and apply the research tool of Porter's, SWOT's, and Diamond's for qualitative4.know and apply the research tool of SPSS for quantification5.develop and apply the model of the creative mechanism in technology6.perform the application of patent

description.zh: (1)簡介 (2)光學訊號處理 (3)光學轉換 (4)光學圖像識別(5)光學儲存 (6)光學顯示 (7)光學計算 (8)個案討論
description.en: (1)Introduction (2) Signal Processing with Optics (3) Transformation with Optics (4) Pattern Recognition with Optics (5) Information Storage with Optics (6) Information Display with Optics (7) Computing with Optics (8) Case study

name.zh: 半導體薄膜特性與製程
name.en: Properties and Fabrication Techniques of Semiconductor Thin

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2)半導體物理特性，(3)半導體光學特性，(4)薄膜結構及特性(包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5)發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6)真空系統，(7)薄膜沉積技術，(8)磊晶及摻雜，(9)應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。
description.en: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 一、 簡介二、 數學模式三、 小信號干擾之系統響應四、 同步機之模擬五、 同步機之線性模式六、 激磁系統七、 激磁對穩定度之影響八、 多機組系統之穩定度
description.en: 一、 Introduction二、 The Mathematical Model三、 System response to small disturbances四、 The simulation of synchronous machines五、 Linear Models of synchronous machines六、 Excitation System七、 Effect of excitation on stability八、 Multimachine Systems with constant Impedance loads

notes: 綜科館機電學院研討室

description.zh: 讓學生對於模糊邏輯、模糊推論有一整體性了解，並對於將模糊邏輯在控制工程之應用具有理論與軟體撰寫之能力。
description.en: 1. To familiarize students with fuzzy logic and fuzzy inference. 2. To familiarize students with designing controllers based on fuzzy inference. 3. To familiarize students with system modeling through fuzzy rules.

description.zh: 現代能源工程技術，決定製程成本，故如何統合有效率的能源管理技術是決定產品競爭力的關鍵，本課程主要內容為：    1.能源成本控制    2.區域型電力能管理策略    3.能源系統的經濟性設計概念    4.冷暖系統的檢測與分析    5.總合能源操作的工程化資料收集    6.新能源系統的生態模組化設計
description.en: At the completion of this course, students will be able to.1.Compare and contrast the various forms of energy eonversion.2.Examine the techmologies used to convert chemical energy into mechanical energy.3.Apply the concepts of electrical converters.4.Evaluate the major types of energy storage.5.Deformine how human values affect the success of energy conservation.6.Analyze the methods in which energy can be conserved with in the various energy sectors of society.

notes: 機電學院-研討室(綜科館3樓)

description.zh: 結合工作衡量之基礎及人事管理之應用，並使用工業工程之基本管理知識，使學生瞭解績效管理之概念、程序、方法及步驟，達成最終提昇工作績效之目地。
description.en: Combining the work measurement and personnel management applications to make the students realize the concept、procedure、methods of performance management. To improve performance of work is the target of this course.

description.zh: 1.策略管理者的特徵責任及風格 2.企業環境的偵察 3.策略形成 4.策略執行與評估 5.資訊科技與管理，高科技公司與多國籍企業的策略管理
description.en: This course attempts to define and analyze many the issue and function involved in management. The objection is to provide a set of frameworks for the development and analysis of strategic planning. The course seeks to structure the key dimension and the process of the strategic planning.

description.zh: 使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。
description.en: This course lets the students understand the concepts, theories, and areas of qualify control, organization and functions of quality department. Besides, the way to manage the products or the service quality, tools and methods of quality control, the way to improve the quality, quality representation method, evaluation of quality control, related regulations and future trends are also included

description.zh: 透過講課、討論、專題報告的方式，瞭解投資的擬定、報酬與風險分析、執行與評估方法，並探討不同因素對投資之影響，期提供良好的投資決策。
description.en: The objective of this course lies in definition of investment, return and risk analysis, investment execution and evaluation methods. Various factors that affect the investment decision problems are discussed to help decision-maker properly resolves investment decision-making.

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在研習機器學習的基本概念、執行演算法、應用方法與其在工程與管理上之應用，課程內容包括:1. 機器學習基本概念與應用;2.機器學習演算法概論3.歸納學習演算法4.決策樹演算法5.案例式學習演算法6.專家系統建立7.機器學習應用方法8.機器學習論文導讀9.機器學習專題製作
description.en: The Machine Learning course is to introduce and study the machine learning concepts, algorithms, application methodologies and its applications on engineering and management. The course encompasses the following topics.1. Machine learning concepts and applications.2. Machine learning algorithms. 3. Inductive learning algorithms. 4. Decision tree algorithms. 5. Case-based learning algorithms. 6. Construction of expert systems. 7. Applications of machine learning. 8. Paper readings on machine learning. 9. Projects on machine learning.

description.zh: 本課程目的在於讓學生瞭解行銷通路之基本理論與整體架構，明瞭行銷通路與行銷管理的關係，知道並熟悉行銷通路的分析與研究方法，討論行銷通路的發展趨勢。而授課主題包括通路的本質、功能與流程，通路結構，通路行為，通路溝通，通路策略及通路續效評估等。
description.en: The Objective of this course is to discuss major topics in marketing channel. A marketing channel is viewed as an interorganizational system involved with the task of making goods, services, and concepts available for consumption by enhancing their time, place, and possession utilities. It is to introduce student concepts and skills to master major issues in the class. Through case discussion, students will develop skills in making channel decisions. Course requirements are attendance, participation, presentations, and a term paper.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討模擬學基本理論如模式化方法資料分析、分配之選定及判別、模擬進行、及結果分析。此外，相關文獻及運用領域將深入探討。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the fundamental of simulation,such as modeling approch, data analysis, selection and testing of distribution,simulations,and output analysis. Besides, the related literature reviews and applications areas will be focused.

description.zh: 以矩陣的表示法介紹迴歸的模式，其內容包括： ‧簡單線性迴歸-簡單線性迴歸模式，估計子的推論，模式的診斷 和估計子的同步推論 ‧一般線性迴歸 ‧變異數分析與迴歸模式 ‧案例討論
description.en: Use matrix approach to introduced the regression model which includes： 1.Simple Linear Regression--Simple Linear Regression model, Inferences of estimators in regression models, Diagnostics and simultaneous Inferences. 2.General Linear Regression 3.Analysis of Variance and Regression Analysis 4.Case study

description.zh: 物流有隱含供應鏈的觀念，物流管理係從供應商、製造商到最終顧客，整個配銷通路管理的整合性哲學。內容有物流構面、供應鏈、存貨決定、倉儲管理、運輸管理、訂單處理、資訊系統、全球物流等。
description.en: Logistics implies supply chain concept. Logistics management is an integrated philosophy to manage the total flow of distribution channel from supplier to ultimate customer. The course includes dimension of logistics, supply chain, inventory decision systems, global logistics and manufacturing systems design.

description.zh: 知識發現與資料探勘課程的目的在研究應用資料探勘技術、資料倉儲技術及知識發現技術，以從企業經營資料庫中，探勘出對提升產業競爭力有幫助的知識，其包含下列主題:1.知識發現與資料探勘概論2.資料倉儲技術在資料探勘的應用3.資料處理技術4.教導型學習方法5.教導型學習方法6.關聯法則探勘7.資料探勘在產業經營管理的應用
description.en: The knowledge discovery and data mining course is to study the applications of the modern knowledge discovery and data mining techniques and to retrieve useful business knowledge for large enterprises to maintain a competitive edge. The course covers the following topics.1.Knowledge discovery and data mining basics2.Data warehousing techniques for data mining3.Data processing4.Supervised learning5.Unsupervised learning6.Association rules mining7.Applications data mining and knowledge discovery techniques to business managemen

description.zh: 知識經濟時代「創新研發」已成為產業最重要的競爭力之一，配合此一趨勢的發展，政府積極招攬國外企業來台設立創新研發中心，同時鼓勵本國企業在台設立創新研發總部，企圖使台灣成為企業的全球研發中心，支援企業從事全球佈局活動所需之技術能力，並使研發服務業成為台灣的重要產業。因此，產品研發管理人才已成為企業最重要的幹部。本所之產品研發管理教授課程包含: 新產品開發流程、品質機能展開、DFM-設計易製化、6 σ設計、田口品質工程、產品資料管理(PDM)、產品開發協同設計與智慧財產權專利申請製作等主題。
description.en: To meet the trends of innovation and ODM for industries in Taiwan, the knowledge of Product R&D Management for IE field is crucial more than ever. Therefore, the course of Product R&D Management includes new product development process, Quality Function Deployment (QFD), Design for manufacturability (DFM), Six sigma and Design for Six sigma, Taguchi Method, Product Data Management (PDM), Collaborative product commerce and Patent Editing.

description.zh: 本課程內容共分零售基本概念、零售規劃技巧、零售機構之管理、零售之行銷組合及零售之應用與未來趨勢等五篇。第一篇「零售基本概念」，介紹零售的本質，描述零售機構的型態及台灣零售業之發展與未來趨勢。第二篇「零售規劃技巧」，說明如何訂定零售策略及進行零售研究，闡述商圈規劃與分析，並且探討零售地點選擇的決策流程與評估技術。第三篇「零售機構之管理」，先敘述零售組織規劃，然後討論零售業人力資料管理的程序及重點，也論及零售機構財務規劃、分析及預算制度。第四篇「零售行銷組合」，以行銷組合（產品、訂價、通路及促銷）之概念，分別討論店面設計與商品展示、商品採購與管理，零售訂價技巧及步驟，零售促銷規劃與活動。第五篇「零售之應用與未來趨勢」，將零售管理之學理及概念應用於更廣泛之場合，包括直接銷售（Direct Selling）及綠色零售（Green Retailing），最後針對零售管理之未來趨勢探討科技應用在零售管理，網路行銷及虛擬商店。
description.en: There are five sections in this course. The first section；the basic concepts of retailing which the fundamental concepts, the models of organization and the future tendency are introduced. The second section；the skills of retailing planning, the strategy and research are discussed. The analysis of business circle and store location are decided by several different technologies. The third section；the way of establishing organization and managing the human resources, the financial planning, and budgeting are included. The fourth section；the combination of marketing, the concept of 4P（product, price, path and promotion）, the shop design and product demonstration, produce purchasing and managing, the decision of price and the activities of promotion are included. The fifth section；the future implementation of retailing, the direct selling and green retailing are included. The use of high-tech in retailing, Internet marketing and virtual store are discussed in this section.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括Wavelet轉換、變分法及積分方程等工程分析之技術，且以Matlab軟體來應用至影像處理、噪音振動、最佳控制、偏微分方程等工程應用實例。.
description.en: Including Wavelet transform, Variation principle, and integral equation Engineering Analysis technology, try to use Matlab software apply to Image processing, denoise, optimal control, and solving partial differential equations.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。技術的關鍵特性和技術之生命週期，企業核心技術、來源和取得，技術的管理與風險，國家科技政策之影響，企業與技術生存之道，全球創新產品之開發，全球創新產品的技術策略與戰略，未來趨勢和走向。
description.en: Technological Innovation: Process, Content, and Types, Organization & Organizing for Innovation, Planning and Discontinuous Innovation, Concurrent Engineering and Interface Management, Human Resource Management, Technology Strategy, Dominant Design, Standard, and Compatibility External R&D and Alliances, Competencies and Knowledge Management in R&D Setting, Design and Product Innovation, Global R&D and Product Development, Industrial Research & Development, Assessment and Performance Appraisal, Perspective.

description.zh: 類比系統、數位系統設計、數位控制及微處理機、介面程式設計、程式語言及軟體等及實驗(作)。
description.en: Analogy systems, Digital systems designed, Digital control and microprocessors, Interface programming design, Computer programming, software and Lab.

description.zh: 先修課程：指導教授同意建立法律之基本概念與法律應用之知識，實務之科技企業經營與法律策略之整合。依據科技產業對法律知識需求之特性，概分三大類：(1)科技法律，包括智慧財產權，網際網路與電子商務法律，網路犯罪，智權契約與授權，企業智權管理等，(2)財經法律，包括國際經貿(WTO)爭端解決，國際投資與併購，證券交易，大陸投資等法律，(3)爭端解決機制：訴訟與偵查搜索程序，仲裁，調解，協商談判等
description.en: This course aims to make students realize basic law concept and common sense of law application, simultaneously to integrate between practical technology business management and law strategy.  According to need for technology industries in the respect of law, this course is divided into three parts: (1) Technology Law - including Intellectual Property Rights, Network and Electronic Business Law, Network Criminal, etc. (2)Financial Law - including laws  of WTO dispute resolution, international invest & acquire, stock trade, Investment in PROC, etc. (3) System of Dispute Resolution etc.

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: (1)資料庫系統簡介，(2)關聯式與實體關係資料模型，(3)資料表正規化，(4)結構化查詢語言，(5)交易管理與並時控制(6)分散式資料庫管理系統(7)物件導向式資料庫(8)電子商務中之資料庫(9)資料庫管理(10)網路式資料庫專題－規劃與實作。
description.en: (1)Introduction to database systems,(2)Relational and E-R database models,(3)Normalization of database tables,(4)SQL (Structure Query Language),(5)Transaction management and concurrence control,(6)Distributed database management systems,(7)Object oriented databases,(8)Databases in electronic commerce,(9)Database Administration,(10)Web-based database project-design and implementation.

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.傅立葉分析 3.微波網路 4.向量網路分析儀 5.頻譜分析儀6.時域反射儀 7.向量信號分析儀 8.天線量測
description.en: 1.Introduction  2.Fourier Analysis 3.Microwave Network 4.Vector Network Analyzer 5.Spectrum Analyzer 6.Time Domain Reflectrometry 7.Vector Signal 8.Antenna Measurement

name.zh: 建築施工災害與應變措施
name.en: Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures

description.zh: 基礎開挖施工作業的災害最主要的是擋土牆的傾倒,這是源自於隆起、砂湧及管湧的現象。開挖區的土壤為砂土,如果擋土牆漏水,由於淘空所形成的管湧,會導致鄰房的損壞;由於擋土牆貫入深度的不足以及點井措施的不良,會造成開挖區的砂源,最終導致擋土牆的傾倒。開挖區的土壤如果為粘土,而且粘土含水量大於液限,則開挖區的粘土產生塑性液,使支撐系統挫屈破壞,最後造成擋土牆的破壞。這些原理皆為課程的內容。此外,當基礎施工災害的機制了解之後,再講授如果發現災害的徵兆,如何採取必要的緊急應變措施, 使災害消失於無形,這些應變措施分別按照技術及行政層面來敘述。
description.en: 英文名稱:Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures  The hazand during foundation excavation is retaining wall failure, this may be caused by heaving、boiling and piping。If excavation is conducted in granular soil in which retaining wall is found leaking, the migration of silty soil will trigger piping and eventually wall failure。 If excave embedded depth of retaining wall and point walls are insufficient, this can cause boiling and lead to wall failure。 If encavation is in cohesive soil and water content is higher than liquid limit, plastic flow will lead to huckling of bracing system and to the wall failure。 After the various failure mechanisms are explained, how to identify the symptoms and how to take urgent remedial measures both technology and administration are explained accordingly。

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

notes: 使用綜科演講廳或四樓車輛系書報討論室上課

description.zh: 本課程從車輛的發展史出發，介紹車輛從性能的追求、低公害污染、省能源化、輕量化和環保政策等，到當今世界能源石化燃料危機以及原物料的短缺所衍生的問題，使未來車輛的研究發展條件更趨嚴苛。本內容讓學生了解在未來的車輛發展變遷下其所應具備的基本知識。
description.en: This course introduces the history of the vehicle development. This course contains numerous subjects as follow: vehicle performance, low pollutants, energy economy, light weight, environmental policy, etc. Students will understand the basic knowledge of the future vehicle development.

notes: 使用綜科四樓車輛系書報討論室上課

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 冷凍設計、庫體設計、保溫與防漏設計、熱負荷計算、溫濕度控制、除霜設計與控制、氣流設計、性能分析
description.en: Refrigeration design, structure design, insulation and vapor barrier design, heat load calculation, temperature and humidity control, defrost design and control, airflow design, performance analysis

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 本課程針對目前通用之真空系統原理、設計及實務組裝等議題進行說明與分析。將先針對真空系統進行分類說明，並陳述真空系統實務組裝時所要考慮的事項，以及說明真空系統的抽氣概念與設計。真空腔體的設計原理將會詳細說明，並介紹中低真空、高真空及超高真空的系統設計。
description.en: This class explains and analyzes issues concerning the principle, design, and assembly of vacuum systems that are commonly used today. We will begin with the classification of the vacuum system, then goes into the cautions regarding the assembly of the vacuum systems, as well as the concept and design of the air extraction of the vacuum system. We will also discuss the design principles for the vacuum cavity, and the system design for medium-low, high, and super-high vacuum systems.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一)儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二)儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

notes: 調至星期六9時至12時教室綜科421

name.en: Non-eelctric Power Air Cond. Energy saving Tech.

description.zh: 非電力空調節能技術在與傳統利用機械壓縮式系統比較下，具有實質提供冷熱與電力的低成本、高效率之最佳經濟上特性。本課程內容將涵蓋： 1.吸收式系統技術 2.各式燃料電池﹝Fuel Cell﹞的連結應用技術 3.氫氣引擎的應用 4.MHD-磁動力流體發電技術 5.各種非電力空調技術評估 6.系統的最適化設計
description.en: The overall purpose of Non-electric Power Air Cond. Energy Saving Technology: 1.The Concept of Absorption Heat pump tech. 2.Fuel Cell System integration with Cogen. Sys. 3.Hydro-engine utilization tech. 4.Tech.of M.H.D. power generation. 5.Evaluation Tech for Non-electric Power Air Cond. Sys. 6.Optimize Design of Non -electric Power Air Cond. Sys.

description.zh: 建築耗能佔有國家整體能源極大之比例，對於社會、經濟及環境等議題具有相當重要之影響。因此，提升建築能源使用效率、降低成本和環境保護之設計要求，對於專業的建築環境控制工程師以及建築師而言，實為責無旁貸之責任與挑戰。本課程將講授建築設計規劃與空調系統、照明系統、動力系統、建築能源管理系統等環境控制設備之整合節能設計學理、建築節能模擬與分析、以及相關國內外建築節能標準之應用與設計內涵。學生將藉由課堂授課、資料閱讀、討論及專題模擬分析過程中，學習並養成建築節能之創新設計與技術應用。
description.en: Buildings are significant users of energy in a society and their energy consumption has important implications to social, economic and environmental issues.  A challenging task of building professional engineers and architects today is to design and promtote energy efficient buildings in a cost effective and environmentally responsive way.  This course is intended to introduce the energy efficent technologies of building environmental control systems in the sense of integrated planning, and explain the common methods for building energy anaylysis and building energy efficiency standards.  This course presents the concept of architecture design and planning, optimization of HVAC systems, and technology needed to integrated the heating, cooling, natural ventilation, lighting, electricity, and building energy management systems into building's strutre and design.  Students will study the topics through lectures, readings, discussions, and project analysis.  It is hoped that the knowledg

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming、network analysis、dynamic programming、game theory、(non)Integer linear programming、markov chains (markovian decision process)、queueing theory、inventory models、forecasting models、decision analysis and system simulation

name.en: Seminar of Services Marketing and Management

description.zh: 本課程主要研討服務行銷與管理，內容包括：（1）服務分類（2）服務接觸（3）服務品質（4）服務環境（5）服務失誤（6）服務補救（7）服務策略（8）顧客滿意（9）顧客價值管理（10）服務定價。
description.en: The course mainly discusses concepts of services marketing and management. The contents will include following topics：（1）classification of services, （2）the service encounter, （3）service quality,（4）servicescape, （5）service failure, （6）service recovery, （7）service strategies, （8）customer satisfaction, （9）customer value management,（10）service pricing.

description.zh: 探討企業如何蒐集、提供資訊，以有效強化策略管理，主題包括：1. 從價值鏈分析，掌握策略面的成本管理。2. 從資訊系統的策略性使用，引領企業創新。3. 以資訊科技再造組織，作為策略性目標的啟動機制。
description.en: 英文概述	The study of how organizations gather and provide information to facilitate effective strategic management, including:1. Strategic cost management via value chain analysis2. Strategic use of information systems for business innovation3. Using information technology as a re-engineering tool for achieving strategic initiatives

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程首先探討學校評鑑理論與實務相關議題，其次瞭解各國技職學校評鑑現況，並提出相關資訊以作為修正與改進當前技職學校評鑑實務的指引。
description.en: This course first discusses the concept of school evaluation, followed by a presentation of case studies of school evaluation from across the World. We also provide information to project staff and key stakeholders as a guide for revision and improvement of project plans, management, utilization of resources and training activities

description.zh: 介紹學校產學合作教育理念、策略、程序、工作內容、案例與教學策略、產學訓合作教育模式，探討學校產學合作相關機制與問題，以作為應用之基礎。
description.en: Academic knowledge generates practical usage for technical-vocational school, and practice value from technical-vocational school helps to improve the academic world. This course is to explore the collaboration strategy, concept, cases, contents, and procedures for basis of application.

description.zh: 針對職業內容、從業人員條件、職業相關資料，與職業手冊編製與運用進行主題探討，同時，就技職教育與訓練或人力資源等領域的相關從業人員進行能力分析，挑選有興趣之子題研擬，心得報告於課堂中研討。
description.en: The course aims to (1) exploration of the main research in occupation analysis, (2) exploration of competency analysis in technical-vocational education and training program or in the field of human resource. Topics include occupation contents, the requirement of enterprise worker, occupation relation occupation, and the application & compilation of occupational manual. Discussion, selected topics research, and reporting in class are required.

description.zh: 在知識經濟時代裡，決定各企業間彼此競爭的最後勝負，不是產能、效率、更不是任何實體資產的多寡，卻是在於企業內的組織文化、人才素質與知識傳遞的能力，是否能夠比競爭對手更優秀。本課程的目的是希望讓學生對於存在組織內部與外部，及員工本身內隱及外顯之重要的知識面，做有系統的收集、創造、儲存、傳遞、分享、與利用的過程與管理。
description.en: In the times of knowledge-based economy, what a count in deciding the enterprise's success in the competition of others is not its productivity, efficiency, or not the amount of entity property, but the organization culture, manpower quality, and knowledge delivery ability.  The purpose of this curriculum hopes to let student understand how to systematically collect, create, store, deliver, share, and employ the information inside and outside the organization and the employee.

description.zh: 本課程為沿續教育統計學（一）課程，探討教育問題進階研究，所需之統計理論與方法。課程內容含卡方檢定法、多因子變異數分析、趨向分析、共變數分析、因素分析及無母數統計考驗等。
description.en: This course focuses on application of statistical principles and methods. Course contains include Chi-square techniques, multivariate analysis of variance, trend analysis, covariance analysis, factor analysis and nonparametric tests.

description.zh: 本課程旨在了解教育相關法規命令以及立法程序。討論重點包括大學法、師資培育法、教師法、教育人員任用條例...等主要法令。
description.en: This course aims to introduct the current case law and the knowledge of legislation. Topics include University Acr, Teacher Act, Training Act, etc.

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含:社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

description.zh: 促進教師瞭解生涯發展與規劃過程相關議題，輔助教師進行生涯探索、決策與規劃，並增強教師生涯發展的促動力量。
description.en: Promotes teacher awareness on issues relevant to understand the career development and planning processes across the lifespan, and assists teachers in their career exploration, decision-making and planning. Giving increased impetus to teachers' career development.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討學習心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；課程重點包括認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派之分析、學習心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢等。
description.en: This course aims to study the peculiarity, scope, theories, and research methodology on learning psychology. Topics include behavioral approaches, cognitive approaches and other related theories, types of learning, and applications of learning theories.

name.en: Theory of Curriculum in Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 本課程之開課，在探索技職教育課程的學理，包括技職育課程的理論基礎、當代課程理論的派別與典範，以及各課程理論的意涵與啟示。
description.en: The course isdesinged is designed to explore the theory of curriculum in technical-vocational eduction, including the foundations of curriculum, theories, the paradigms of curriculum thoughts and theirs implications.

name.zh: 人力資源發展政策與策略
name.en: Policies and Strategies of Human Resource Development

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展政策與策略之理論知識；（二）培養進行人力資源發展政策與策略的能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展政策與策略之關係、人力資源發展策略實務模式分析、人力資源發展政策之擬定、人力資源發展策略規劃方法、各級人力之發展、高階管理人員發展、國際化人力資源發展等。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the theory of human resources policies and strategies of human resource development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of policies and strategies of human resource development. Topics including the relationship between policies and strategies of human resource development, the analysis model of strategies of human resource development, the methods of policy making of human resource development, the methods of strategic plan of human resource development, manpower development, high level managers development, international human resource development.

name.en: Design and Evaluation of Web Teaching

description.zh: 探討網路線上教學的系統化教學設計與評鑑。內容包括線上教學的分析、設計、效益評估，以及線上教學策略、教師角色與任務、學生角色與任務、成功因素、線上教學經營管理、實際線上教學案例等。
description.en: To explore systematic design and evaluation of Web teaching including instructional analysis, design, and evaluation, and online teaching strategies, teacher roles and tasks, student roles and tasks, successful factor,online teaching management, practical online teaching cases etc..

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討成人與推廣教育的基礎、方法與其應用的情形，課程括二大部份；第一部份比較成人與推廣教育的理論基礎典範，第二部份除歸納分析主要的成人與推廣教育方法外，也同時探討其在技職專業教育領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course studies the foundations and methods that are relevant to the Adult & Continuous Education. It focuses on understanding the paradigm of theoretical fundamental of Adult & Continuour Education in general. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream methods practiced in Technological Education field.

name.zh: 獨立研究--教育發展策略

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育教學發展策略，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in education development strategy. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research in education development strategy and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討各種高分子之聚合方法及動力學之研究，如逐步聚合、遊離基連鎖聚合、乳化聚合、離子連鎖聚合、連鎖共聚合反應、開環聚合、立體規則高分子之合成，未終止的游離基聚合方法。從分子量的分佈，結構物性之關係，作高分子聚合之最佳化設計，並且探討這些聚合方法如何應用在最新的科技上，如光電材料、複合材料。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the polymer synthesis and Kinetics studies. The synthesis includes step polymerization, free radical chain polymerization, emulsion polymerization, ionic chain polymerization, chain copolymerization, ring opening polymerization, sterospecific polymerization and living free radical polymerization. The synthesis scheme is optimized with the structure-properties relationship and molecular design. The potential application of these methods in high-tech materials, such as optoelectronics, and composites, will be elucidated.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹一系列的生物分子及這些生物分子所扮演的角色。課程從認識細菌、植物、動物細胞及各種細胞胞器開始，接著探討蛋白質、酵素、DNA、RNA結構和功能及他們在生命中的重要性。再論及DNA複製及轉錄和RNA轉譯成蛋白質的重要性及機制。PCR和DNA重組技術的重要性是安排在最後來介紹。
description.en: This course is to introduce a series of biomaterials and their functions. Begins from bacterial, plant, and animal cells and the differences between these cell organs. To learn of DNA, RNA, proteins, and enzymes base on their structures and functions. The phenomena of DNA replication and translation, and RNA translation will be studied. The PCR method and DNA recombinant technology also included in this course.

description.zh: 課程兩個主要目標為光譜學方法及分離方法。光譜學方法內容含紫外、可見、紅光、核磁、x-ray等光譜法。電子譜及質譜也將被討論。分離方法方面有液層、氣層、膠層等層析法。分離後串聯之光譜分析也會學習。
description.en: Two major goals of this course are spectroscopy and separation methods. Spectroscopy methods include ultraviolet, visible, infrared, nuclear magnetic, and x-ray spectroscopies.Election and mass spectrometry are also included. Separation methods are: gas, liquid, and gel chromatographies. In addition, GC-MS,LC-MS, GC-IR, etc. will be studied.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子?電路成像高分子?光電子成像材料?最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討界面的物理化學現象及其在高科技之應用。包括有(1) 表面及界面張力的分子理論(2)界面的作用力(3)表面及界面的熱力學(4)液體和固體界面的熱力學(5)表面及界面張力的測量(6)接觸角的測量(7)吸附的熱力學(8)分散液的穩定性(9)分散液分子間吸力及斥力(10)懸浮液之高分子穩定性(11)凝聚(12)界面科學在高科技及光電工業上之原理及應用。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the interfacial phenomena and its application in high-tech Industries. It includes (1)molecular theory of surface and interface (2)molecular interaction of interface (3)thermodynamics of surface and interfaces (4)thermodynamics of liquids in contact with solids (5)measurement of surface and interfacial tension (6)contact angle measurement (7)thermodynamics of adsorption (8)stability of dispersion (9)molecular interaction of dispersion (10)stability of suspension (11)flocculation(12)application of interface science in High-tech industries

description.zh: 介紹高分子材料：如纖維、塑膠、橡膠、生醫高分子化合物等之合成、性質、鑑定和應用。
description.en: The material in this course covers fundamental and practical aspects of polymeric materials. The various types of organic materials such as fibers, plastics, rubbers and biomedical polymeric compounds will be introduced. Syntheses, Properties, Characterization and applications are presented.

name.en: Theory and Practice of Landscape Ecological Design

description.zh: 景觀生態學是以生態學理論來理解並建立一套可以認知景觀與其中的生物﹑非生物環境關係的學科。有關景觀的生態設計理論基本上是將這一系列景觀生態學模型或原理作為設計指標而形成的一套設計操作理論。景觀生態原理在景觀學科中具有極其根本的角色，不僅在景觀資源保育與管理上提供極具價值的參考；對於景觀規畫與設計實務者更提供了在不同尺度範疇狀況下三向度空間設計的形態準則。因此，課程涵蓋了從區域、基地和細部設計三種尺度的設計內涵，講述及操作在基於不同目的的需求時，人為景觀如何介入自然環境，以及導入的人為景觀的設計準則。1. 景觀生態與形態理論2. 景觀生態設計理論3. 景觀生態設計理論的應用    a. 都市地區和鄉村地區        b. 區域、基地和細部設計尺度
description.en: Landscape ecology seeks for principles and models that contribute to dealing with conservation, management, and design in landscape practice. The course "Landscape Theory and Practice of Ecological Design" refers to those principles and models established in landscape ecology and then applies to landscape planning and design. Issues relates to this courses are listed as follows;1. Landscape Ecology and landscape morphology2.  Ecological design theory3.  The application of ecological theory in landscape         practice     a. Urban region and countryside         b. Macro-sale, meso-sale, and micro-scale

description.zh: 設計之本質在建構新經驗，創造即做出新經驗，新經驗是未知，未知的求解即「解題」，經由主體的解題思考模式推演而得。對於主體而言經驗是相對的，經驗無法直接傳遞，必須經主體與客體間之交互建構，內化後才能成為主體之經驗。空間結構為一意義表達之外顯形式，創作者藉由此表層結構傳達其新經驗。此新經驗必須建構於創作者意識內於先，是為深層結構，再依此深層之意義形諸於外。因此創作者應是在從事一系列的行為，包括建構一意義之深層結構至轉化成一傳達意義之表層結構。 誘導式結構為一主體的「解題」思考模式；從已知成份著手分析歸納，以推論那尚未知悉的成份，終而掌握所欲追求之「解」。這種認知是在主體內經由誘導式結構.操作模型之引導，自「不知」轉為「知」，使主體在已知與未知之間搭建其誘導式結構。本理論授課分為：課程一，「誘導式結構理論」課程二，「誘導式結構理論應用」
description.en: HS is a thinking model for problem solving, an analysis of the 'known' in order to master the 'unknown' to solve the problem.  The subjective party's cognition is guided by the HS manipulating model, the transfer from 'unknown' to 'known', lets the subjective party construct a heuristic structure in between known and unknown.  The HS theory instruction consists of two courses 1,"The Heuristic Structure Theory"2,"The Application of The Heuristic Structure Theory"

name.en: Special Topics on Environmental Behanior Studies

description.zh: 本課程的目的是探討人類行為與環境設計間的關係，介紹環境行為學的源起與發展，及其相關理論與分析架構；並藉由觀察與評估現有生活環境中的行為，作為教導學生實際參與環境規劃之操作。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to probe the relation between human behavior and environmental design, introducing not only the original and development of environment-behavior, but also its relative theory and analysis frame. Via observing and evaluating the behavior of the present living environment , teach the student how to actually participate in the operation of environmental planning.

description.zh: 構法計畫是建築計畫重要的一部份，也是本地建築研究亟待加強的部份。本課程藉著系統整合的途徑讓學生掌握建築系統組合的機制與操作的方法，藉以提昇建築設計的密度與建築的品質。課程內容包括：    現代系統理論介紹    建築系統的分解與組合    系統整合的觀念與手法 構法整合實例與實驗
description.en: The planning of building system is an essential part of architectural planning. But it needs strengthen badly in our architecture study. In this course we use a systematic approach to handle the mechanism of integration in building systems, and the method of conduction, that may promote our design density and building quality.
