This course contents:    Introduction of contemporary System Theory    Divide and unify of building systems    Concepts and methods of System Integration    Cases and experiments of integration in building systems

name.en: An Advanced study on green Building

description.zh: 一、教學目標：1.	學習且體認國內外綠建築、環境共生建築及永續經營建築之課題與本質。研討國內外對其課題之解決方法，並培養研擬課題與本土化規劃設計方法之能力。二、教學內容：1.	綠建築、環境共生建築、永續建築之內涵。2.	研討地球環境、人類生活環境及建築環境之相互關係。3.	研討環境共生與綠建築之本質。4.	研討綠建築與生命週期各階段之環境課題。5.	研討國內外綠建築規劃、設計技術及解決方法。6.	研討綠社區、綠都市之發展規劃。
description.en: 1.	The contect of Green Building, Symbiosis Building and Sustainable Building.2.	Study of relation between globe environment, hurman life environment and architecture environment.3.	The nature of  Green Building and Symbiosis Building.4.	The discussion of Green Building and Life Cycle.5.	The technology and method of Green Building Planning.6.	The Planning of Green Community and Green City.

description.zh: 本課程以探討都市再生過程中種種再開發模式及策略為主軸，透過不同類型之各國都市再開發案例進行專題討論分析比較。討論主題以當代環境主流議題為優先，包括：日本親水環境案例水岸空間開發案例綠建築與生態社區永續生態都市(歐洲生態小學案例)都市防災公園設計規劃商業空間更新（商店街、形象商圈，美國主街計劃）社區總體營造與都市更新車站周邊區域更新閒置空間、歷史街區保存與都市發展特殊產業之再開發案例介紹與解析6. 都市設計相關議題7. 民眾參與8. 管理維護組織9. 案例介紹與解析
description.en: This course regards different strategies & redevelopment types as the central concept to discuss about the issues of urban regeneration through survey different examples of different countries which consisted of several parts mentioned as below: the redevelopment projects of waterfrontthe redevelopment projects of ecology community & green buildingthe redevelopment projects of eco-citythe plan & design of disaster prevention parkthe redevelopment projects of commercial areathe redevelopment projects of station neighborhoodthe conservation of historical area the redevelopment projects of industry area

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討台灣地區從日據時期至民國八十年代都市規劃範型的演變，內容包括各歷史階段中的經濟、社會及政治背景的主要特徵，以及對應在都市規劃作業上的實際狀況。並藉由案例分析，使學生更深入認識都市規劃的本質及其背後各種支配力量和限制因素。
description.en: The course mainly explores the urban planning history during last one hundred years in Taiwan. The changing paradigms and the social, economic, and political contexts of each time period are discussed.In addition, many planning cases are analyzed to obtain the better ideas of what the characteristics of urban planning, the dominated powers behind, and the limitations are.

description.zh: 授課內容主要在介紹從事都市計畫或都市設計經常習用有關都市方面的資料蒐集、調查以及分析的各種方法，重點涵蓋都市空間理論、人口、產業、交通成長理論及相關的資料調查技術。所使用的分析方法包括統計分析、模式運用、地理資訊系統及試算表分析等，並以實例介紹有關都市人口、產業活動、交通運輸量的分析及預測，使學生能將學習的理論與與實務相結合，增進都市分析的專業能力。
description.en: The course focus is on the training of urban analysis methods to urban planning and design professions. The theories about urban spatial planning, population forecasting, economic development, and transportation analysis are introduced. Emphasis is laid on the methods of data collection and investigation techniques, geographic information system operation, statistics analysis, and spreadsheet utilization. Students are required to complete some related applications to improve both their academic abilities and professional capabilities.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的在研究目前環境議題與強化有關環境規劃設計的理論與經驗，以及增進對環境整體規劃與設計可能途徑的瞭解。故本課程主要內容包括：一、緒論 二、環境決策 三、環境保護政策 四、永續發展 五、達到良好環境規劃與設計的可能途徑 六、環境規劃與設計的專業實務練習 七、結論
description.en: The purpose of this course is to explore the nature of current environmental issues, and further our knowledge about current theories and experiences with the various approaches to environmental planning and design. Our hope is to improve planning and design practice. To examine these concerns, the course includes: 1.Introduction 2.Environmental decision-making 3.Environmental protection policy 4.Sustainable development 5.Alternative approaches to environmental planning and design. 6.Professional practice of environmental planning and design 7.Conclusions

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

name.zh: 製造科技特論及實驗(二)
name.en: Special Topics and Experiments of Manufacturing Technology (

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程包括理論與實務，由製科所教授共同開課。第二學期探討的範圍包含製造設備、量測與檢測，側重在與製造業相關之專業知識。
description.en: This course includes theories and experiments, is conducted by several professors of institute of manufacturing technology. In second semester, topics covered are mainly in the field of manufacturing equipment, measuring and inspection, emphasizing in professional knowledge of manufacturing industry.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意工程最佳化方法導論，線性規畫法，非線性規畫法，多目標函數最佳化，近代數學規畫法介紹，機械元件與系統之最佳設計
description.en: Engineering Optimization Concepts, Linear Programming Methods,Nonlinear Programming Methods, Multi-objective Optimization,Introduction to Modern Mathematical Programming Technigues,Optimum Design of Mechanical Components and Systems

name.zh: 精密機械精度分析與控制
name.en: Analysis and control of Accuracy for precision Machinery

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。精密機械，機械安裝，精密機構，機構運動特性，力、流與熱影響，機械力與變形控制，電機運動控制，流體動力控制，環境相關事項。
description.en: Precision machinery, Machine installations, Precision mechanism, Movement properties of mechanism, Force, fluid and heat effects of structure, Mechanical control, Electrical control, Fluidic power control, Environmental issues。

description.zh: 課程內容包括：微細加工基本概念，傳統加工方式之比較，各種加工方式比較與市場分析， 微細放電加工， 微細超音波加工(超音波簡介與應用)， 微細電解加工與電解拋光， 鐳射加工於微細加工的應用， 微細探針加工法簡介，微細探針的應用， STM，AFM的應用與簡介。
description.en: Introduce the concepts of micromachining. compare and analyse micro machining method,   Micro-EDM, Micor-USM, ECM, Laser machining, Micro probes machining and applications, Introduction of STM，AFM.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

description.zh: 以設計相關主題，專題設計方式，訓練獨立企劃、分析、評斷、組織、歸納與創新之思考，並實際演練，以培養專案之研發設計能力。課程以題目界定、資料收集、分析調查、結論定義、構想發展、細部設計、模擬驗證、專題設計研究報告提交等為教學內容。
description.en: This course provides study of Design Project related topics on Principles and Practice of product development and evaluation. The contents of this topic will include visualized, simulation and practical case study. It will become an integrator and during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs. This is where the user easy understanding applies.

description.zh: 本課程主要以講座、研習營方式探討及演練有關生活實用科技及創意產業化之原理與實作。內容包括：生活實用科技與應用、智慧財產權與管理、數位音像設計與行銷、商業經營模式與設計管理、本土化創作與品牌經營、創意產業化與行銷。
description.en: Theory and Professional Practice on Workshop Subjects for Cultural Innovation and Business Management: （1）Applied technology for New lifestyle.（2）Intelligence property and its positioning.（3）Design and Marketing for multi-media.（4）Interaction between Business model and Design Management.（5）Indigenous works on randay.（6）Innovation Implementation and Marketing.

description.zh: 以親人性、創造力跨科際整合的設計思維與管理知能，對設計知識與專業技能之理論及實務，從文獻探討、理論專研、實務案例等深入淺出，培養設計專業領域創新管理相關知能、洞見和體認，期能對設計創新管理相關問題解決，提出整合、創新、前瞻之具體可行方案。
description.en: In an age of rapid social, technological and cultural change, we need a new kind of design professional who is able to bring the creativity, innovation, flexibility and knowledge needed to exploit new opportunities and make things happen. Through literature review, theoretical study, and case study, this course provides design related competence and new insights, in terms of tacit knowledge, ideation, communication, leadership, strategy, globalization, and interdisciplinary collaboration.

name.zh: 流行時尚族群行為研究

description.zh: 代表流行文化的流行時尚族群對生活物品的設計影響深遠。本課程針對此族群的生活型態、喜好度與期望性等因素，展開隨機性或系統性觀察，並配合訪談、問卷與實驗等研究步驟作資料收集。再經由資料分析（質化與量化兼具）與歸類，整理出流行時尚族群的興趣與傾向，作為流行生活用品設計的重要參考依據。
description.en: Fashion groups representing the popular culture widely affect the design of living artifacts. This study will focus on target groups' lifestyle, preferences and desirability to undertake casual and systematic observation. Additionally, the methods of face-to-face interviews, questionnaire and experiment are used to collect data and information and tend to be analyzed with the formation of qualitative and quantitative research. The final result will provide designers as guidelines, which might identify the target group's interest and preference.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討調查研究法與統計學之理論基礎，課程著重其在工業設計領域內的實際運用情形。
description.en: This course is designed to study the theoretical foundation of survey and statistical reasoning that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. The course focuses on its' application in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 本課程主要在於介紹產品環保化設計的概念與實務做法，將會詳細介紹生命週期評估的內涵與原理做法，並將透過軟體的實際作來學期如何從事產品的生命週期評估。簡化式的生命週期評估之作法也會在課堂中被介紹。
description.en: This course focuses on introducing the meaning and principles of designing environmentally sound products. The theories and principles of Life Cycle Assessment (LCA) will be introduced extensively. Several sets of LCA computer software will be utilized in the classes for students to practice. Besides, the streamlined LCA (SLCA) will also be taught in the class.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。

description.zh: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計 (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹 (3)基礎迴授控制器設計 (4)前饋控制器設計 (5)估測器設計(6)多軸路徑控制 (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體與LCD設備。學生從這門課程中可學到如何利用 PC_based 控制器去完成一套運動控制系統。
description.en: The course of computerized motion control includes the following topics:  (1) Command generator design (2) Introduction of motion control plant and feedback system (3) Feedback control loop design (4) Feedforward control loop design (5) Observer design (6) Multi-axis contouring control (7) Case study: semiconductor/LCD equipment。 The student will understand how to develop a PC_based motion control system by this course.

name.zh: 微奈米量測系統與技術

description.zh: 微奈米量測工程技術為是現代科技發展之重要前瞻技術，它將探討有效尺寸在微奈米等級範圍之精密量測儀器與技術. 本課程將涵括下列各項現代精密量測主題:1.近代光電量測系統與技術2.量測統計原理3.量測信號處理4.三次元座標量測系統與技術5.雷射干涉系統與技術6.影像量測系統與技術7.微奈米量測系統與技術-干涉術、相位移術、調變術、光共焦 及   自動聚焦術8.微奈米量測系統與技術--掃瞄探針顯微鏡(SPM), STM, AFM 及   SNOM.9.奈米粉體量測系統與技術10.量測實驗11.小型量測儀器之專題製作
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the advanced systems and technology associated with micro- and nano-scale measurement. The subject includes the following subtopics:1.Modern opto-electro measurement systems and techniques2.Statistic principles for measurement3.Signal processing techniques4.Three-dimensional measurement systems and techniques5.Laser interferometric metrology and systems6.Image processing techniques for metrology7.Micro and nano-measurement systems and techniques (I) -   Moire interferometry, phase shifting, signal modulation,   confocal and auto-focusing techniques.8.Micro- and nano-measurement systems and techniques (II) -   SPM, STM, AFM and SNOM.9.Nano-particle measurement systems and techniques10.Student laboratory/practices11.Team project work for design and fabrication of    small-scaled measurement instrument

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 本課程將基本物理化學原理應用在材料科學上，探討電子組態、化學鍵及晶體結構間之關係。內容包括晶體結構、X 光繞射分析、相平衡、材料之光學及電學性質及材料表面之鑑定及分析。
description.en: This subject covers the basic principles of physical chemistry and shows how they apply in describing the behavior of the solid state. The relationship between electronic structure, chemical bonding and crystal surface is developed. Attention is also given to characterization of atomic and molecular arrangements in materials as well as quantum optical and electrical effects in nanoscale materials.

description.zh: 本課程探討聚合反應及應用反應機構，合成方式包含逐步聚合反應、鏈鎖聚合反應，共聚合反應並研討高分子的化學反應，及其他高分子有關技術。
description.en: The major topics include step reaction polymers, chain reaction polymers, copolymerization, reactions of polymers and polymer technology

description.zh: 1. GPS 的緣起與發展2. GPS 的系統架構3. GPS 的時間與座標4. GPS 的定位原理與觀測量5. GPS 的誤差分析6. GPS 導航定位分法7. GPS 在測量的應用GPS 導航定位實習
description.en: 1. The origin and development of GPS.2. The structure of GPS.3. GPS time and coordination.4. GPS positioning principle and measurements.5. GPS error analysis.6. GPS in navigation.7. GPS in measurement.  8.GPS practice

description.zh: 基礎流體力學原理及實驗、比例閥、伺服元件、電液元件及比較、伺服驅動器設計等實驗(作)。
description.en: A general background in fluid mechanic and use of mechanical laboratory machinery equipment. The course Hydrau-servo Systems introduces the varied aspects of Pneumatic and Hydraulic Servo System Servo and Proportional Valves, Electro-hydraulic Servo-valves, Electro-hydraulic Servomechanisms and Hydra-mechanical Servo-mechanisms. The course in programming is one third time of lectures and the other of laboratory practices.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。膜披覆製程是近年來高科技產業技術一項前途被看好的製程技術之一，廣用於刀具、模具、光學元件、感測器及半導體工業等等。此門課程將提供此項技術之介紹、相關配備、原理與能量提供方式、將包括：沉積技術與應用、化學氣相沉積法、物理氣相沉積法、電鍍技術、真空工程、直流電源、射頻電源、微波、熱燈絲等各種能量介紹、以及膜的成核與生長理論。
description.en: The technology of films coating has advanced dramatically. This advancement was driven primarily by the need for new products and devices in the electronics and optical industries etc.. The rapid progress in various devices would not have been possible without the development of new files coating technology, improved film characteristic and superior file qualities. This course is intended to serve us a guide for the student or practitioner in the field, as a review and overview of this rapidly evolving technology for the graduate students in several branches of science and engineering.

description.zh: 本課程內容包括頻域的Z-轉換、取樣資料系統、數位濾波器設計、數位控制器設計、及狀態空間之數位控制器設計、電腦控制等。
description.en: This course includes Z-transformation, sampled data system, digital filter design, digital control design and implementation in frequency domain and also in state space, and computer control system.

description.zh: 本課程針包含基本的生理信號的簡介，並介紹各種目前應用於醫療上之儀器的基本原理。
description.en: The course includes a brief introduction of the basics of medical physiology, and followed by the introduction of the fundamental principles of operation, applications and design of the medical instruments most commonly used in hospitals.

description.zh: 電腦運動控制課程包含下列課題：(1) 命令產生器設計 (2)運動本體與回授系統介紹 (3)基礎迴授控制器設計 (4)前饋控制器設計 (5)估測器設計(6)多軸路徑控制 (7) 案例探討 -- 半導體與LCD設備。學生從這門課程中可學到如何利用 PC_based 控制器去完成一套運動控制系統。
description.en: The course of computerized motion control includes the following topics:  (1) Command generator design (2) Introduction of motion control plant and feedback system (3) Feedback control loop design (4) Feedforward control loop design (5) Observer design (6) Multi-axis contouring control (7) Case study: semiconductor/LCD equipment。 The student will understand how to develop a PC_based motion control system by this course.

description.zh: 本課程旨在研究家具設計數位化的技巧，藉由各種相關軟體與自行建立Third Party的應用，完成家具設計案虛擬實境的效果，同時以家具設計個案的實際演練，達到家具設計師與客戶間的良好溝通與充分檢討。
description.en: This course aims to study the digital techniques for furntiure design. With the related software and self-made third party applications, the furntiure design project is conducted in the form of virtual-reality. Meanwhile, through the practicing of furntiure design projects the communication between designers and clients is emphasized.

description.zh: 全適性設計專題在探討多元化使用族群適用的產品、環境、和溝通，以尊重人性福址為前提之設計創新思維，開啟新產品開發策略做法，滿足各種各樣的使用者需求。從相關的理論和案例研討，到專題設計的研發，體認詮釋性設計思維方法與實務。
description.en: It is a worldwide design movement that wants to make products, environments and communication usable to the greatest extent possible by the broadest number of users including children, older adults, people with disabilities, people of atypical size or shape, people who are ill of injured, and people inconvenienced by circumstances. Universal design respects human diversity and promotes inclusion of all people in all activities of life. It is not an identifiable style but a way of thinking about the design process. Universal design defines good design as attractive and user-friendly.

description.zh: 數位革命時代的來臨，資訊科技已普遍應用於產品開發，解決日趨複雜的設計體系與程序。本課程之目的在於介紹資訊管理系統之架構與相關技術，探討如何建立一套產品開發的資訊管理系統，分析、整合、儲存、管理及控制跨部門的產品設計資料與工作流程。
description.en: Information technology, which makes the digital revolution happen, has been the crucial solution to the difficulty and complexity of product development. This course discusses the framework and contents of design information management system, that provides the tools to analyze, synthesize, manage, and control the information and procedure of product development.

name.en: The Study of Design Business Management (II)

description.zh: 設計事業管理研究（二）重點可分為：1.客戶關係管理。2. 設計品質管理等。客戶是設計事業生存的根本，沒有客戶，設計師與設計業都不會存在。本課程探討設計者與客戶間的互動與合作關係，以期掌握設計事業最佳的長期生存的條件。維護良好的客戶關係，設計業者應首重設計產品與服務品質之持續提升。
description.en: The Study of Design Business Management (2) stresses: 1. the successful management of designer-client relationships; and 2. design product/service quality. Clients are the lifeblood of a design practice; without clients, designers and design consultants would not exist. The course looks primarily into the interaction between the design practitioner and their clients. It also emphasizes the importance of design product/service quality improvement so that the designer-client relationship may be optimized and the business of the design firm will be in success.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 研究生提出產學合作領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in enterprise cooperative program. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in enterprise cooperative program through independent, directed study.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎，透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對班級經營課題，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in class management. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.en: Administrative Management & Decision Making in Technical

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對技職行政組織、管理模式與決策原則進行個案探討。
description.en: Exploration of research in administrative organization, management models and principles of decision making in technical-vocation education. Case study, group discussion and reporting are required.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討學校公共關係之理論與實務，提供修課學生對學校公共關係的認識。
description.en: The course is designed to develop the ability to manage the school public relation by exploring the concept and principles of school public relation and analyzing the current issues challenging all kinds of  educational institutes.

description.zh: 1.基本分析工具介紹(6) 2.基本光學系統--近軸光學(6) 3.光學系統元件介紹(6) 4.像差理論(6) 5.像質評估(6) 6.光學系統設計(6)7.光學套裝軟體使用(6) 8.光電設計專題(9)
description.en: 1.The tools                     2.The basic optical systems3.Basic optical devices            4.Seidel aberrations5.Image evaluation               6.The design of optical systems7.The use of Zemax              8.Project on optical design

name.en: Applications of Computer Software for Engineering

description.zh: 土木工程涵蓋範圍廣泛，本課程主要著重於工程軟體之應用，務使學生熟悉1.結構設計各步驟之計算方式及其電腦程式之使用方法.2.教授學生自行準備輸入程式資料,並操件以求取結果.3.根據學生之電腦輸出結果或操作中之偵錯方法及結果正誤之研判方法。

資料庫是任何完整的資訊管理系統之不可或缺的一部份，並且已經在各行各業中顯示其與日俱增的重要性，當然土木工程也不例外。尤其近年來地理資訊系統、營建管理系統及地質鑽孔資料庫的發展，更促使土木工程師正視資料庫的重要性，並學習如何有效地管理龐大的相關資訊。因此，本課程的設計即針對此需要來教導學生熟悉現代資料庫系統的設計與技術，以使他們在畢業後更具有競爭力，更容易找到理想的工作。課程的內容將包括資料處理、概念設計、關連式資料模型、及正規化等領域，而學生必須在學期中設計並完成一個完整的資料庫作為專題計畫。關於本課程的其他細節請見下述課程大綱。
description.en: Database (DB) is an integral part of any information management system, and has been playing a significant role in many academic programs and professions, including the civil engineering, construction engineering, and environmental engineering. In recent years, the development of Geographical Information System, Construction Decision Support System, and Geotechnical Data Bank all require practicing civil engineers to understand the principles of underlying data storage and to develop an effective style of data management to achieve competitiveness in the market place. Therefore, it is the focus of this course to guide the students to become familiar with various technical aspects of modern DB systems so that they can perform the above-mentioned tasks and become more employable. This course will cover areas such as data processing, conceptual DB design, relational data model, and normalization. The students are required to complete a semester project and implement a functional DB.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討土木工程施工品質的內容，並藉由諸如統計品管，QC七大手法，ISO9000等品管技能與精義，探討改進工程品質，防止土木災害的相關技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail.Form the learning of statistical quality,QC seven tools and ISO 9000,students can understand how to improve the quality and prevent the accident of civil engineering.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 1.需求面管理與節約能源2.負載管理策略與成效評估3.負載監控與需量控制管理4.汽電共生及其他能源應用5.配電自動化與配電管理實務
description.en: 1.Demand-side Management and Energy Conservation2.Load Management Strategy and Impact Evaluation3.Load Control Technology and Demand Control Management4.Cogeneration and Other Energy Applications5.Distribution Automation and Distribution Management Technologies

name.zh: 積體電路實體設計演算法
name.en: Issues Related to Manufacturing and Reliability

description.zh: 介紹VLSI設計流程及技術地圖基本演算法分割平面規劃擺置、繞線(整體繞線、細部繞線)時脈及電線/接地繞線壓縮佈置後最佳化時序建模及最佳化訊號/電源完整性其它和製作及可靠度有關之議題
description.en: Design Flow of VLSI and Technology RoadmapBasic AlgorithmsPartitionFloorplanningPlacement and Routing (Global Routing, Detail Routing)Interconnection of Clock and Power/GroundOptimization for post-processingModeling and Optimization of TimingSignal Integrity

description.zh: 為應因八十七年之放流水標準,廢水處理必將進入高級處理之階段.在本課程中將深入探討混凝與膠凝,沈凝,氨氣提,過慮,吸附,薄膜處理,離子交換等各單元,並說明如何應用於廢水處理.
description.en: This topic is going to introduce Coagulation and Flocfulation,Sedimentation,Ammonia Removal,Filtration,Adsorption,and on exchange,and let learner know to use each unit on the wastewater treatment.

name.en: Advanced Application of Sensor and Transducer in Mechatronic

description.zh: 感測器及傳感器之設計與製造、訊號處理迴路設計、感測器內部電路之逆向工程、感測器與與機械設計、感測器之應用與匹配。
description.en: Principle of Sensors and Transducers, Design of sensing element, Signal Conditioning Circuit Design, Mechanical Design and Packaging of sensor, Fabrication of sensor, Selection and Application of the sensors.

description.zh: 先修課程：半導體元件物理、高等IC製程   探討奈米矽元件之物理模型，及物理極限之深層探討。
description.en: The study on the physics limits and physics modeling of Nano silicon device.

name.en: Advanced Integrated Circuit Fabrication Process and Lab.

description.zh: 前段製程：包含物理沈積、化學沈積、微影、蝕刻等製程。深入探討最新的製程技術及研究方向。後段製程：包含各種IC封裝的技術及測試方法、並深入探討最新的研究方向。
description.en: Review of the basic IC fabrication Process, Study the state of art of the Fabrication Process, especially about technology and facilities. Including PVD, CVD, doping heat process.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹最新的製造技術。利用物理式及化學式的製造方法來加工新進材料，使用新進光電能源及新進製造工具如雷射、電子束、離子束、電漿、鑽石、化學反應劑等，適應生產微小精密工件之需求，應用電腦化資訊處理設備以監控、診斷及調適製程，以達到智慧型製造的目的。
description.en: Introducing newest manufacturing technology.  Applying  physical and chemical manufacturing methods to process advanced materials, using advanced power source and tools like laser, electron beam, ion beam, plasma, diamond, chemical react agents, adapting the demand for producing small and precision parts, Implementing computerized data processing facilities to control, monitor, diagnose, adapt manufacturing process, in order to achieve the idea of intelligent manufacturing.

name.zh: 車輛工程產業與環境管理
name.en: Vehicle Engineering Business Management and the Environment

description.zh: 產業環境隨著社會經濟活動的頻繁而愈趨複雜。尤其是車輛工程產業，面臨到自政府機關、環保團體、社區團體的壓力，希望該產業的營運能確實達到維持生態環境的永續性。現今產業的營運，不僅要考量國內各個環境層面，也需顧及國際整體環境。目前環境議題整合產業管理決策規劃，對於相關產業更是一大挑戰。本課程主要希望學生透過產業個案的研討去(1)確認問題、分析情況、進而從產業環境著手問題的解?方向(2)評估、規劃與執行產業管理決策。確保產業營運與環境的永續共生。
description.en: The environment of business enterprise is far more complex than before.  Firms, especially vehicle engineering business, are feeling increased pressure from government regulations, environmental organizations, and community groups to ensure that business practices comply with the rule of Mother Nature.  Today's organizations need to concern the changing environment in not only the national dimension but also the international dimension.  On the other hand, the increasing attentions in environmental issues create new set challenges in management and strategic planning.  This course is designed for students who expect to undertake vehicle engineering business management in their career paths.  It is designed to enable you from each case study to (1) identify, analyze, and resolve problems from business environment, and (2) formulate, implement, and evaluate managerial and related strategies at the level of the business unit.

notes: 新聘郭慧鈴博士授課;使用綜科四樓車輛系書報討論室上

description.zh: 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生應用資訊科技來加強都市規劃與設計的能力。授課的主題涵蓋： 1. 電腦科技應用於都市規劃與設計相關領域的現況 2. 都市資訊系統的內涵及功能 3. 都市資訊系統的建構方法與工具 4. 都市資訊系統的應用實例
description.en: The course is designed to help students to utilize the power of newly developed computer technology to urban planning and design applications. The course content including: 1. Introduction of computer technology used in urban planning and design applications. 2. The content and functions of urban information system. 3. The methods and tools of constructing of urban information system. 4. Some applications of urban information system.

description.zh: 本課程授課主要內容分為三部分：第一部份為都市防災概論，此部分主要針對國內外文獻作一回顧，進而瞭解都市防災整體架構，區分為（1）文獻回顧；（2）防災基本計畫；及（3）防災整體架構等。期使國內都市計畫能逐步邁向防災都市計畫，以建立『安全都市』為目標。此部分的主要內容區分為：（1）都市災害風險理念的形成；（2）防災都市計畫與地區防災系統規劃；（3）都市計畫防災系統規劃原則；（4）都市計畫防災作業準則內容架構；（5）都市計畫防災作業準則；（6）安心都市計畫的形成與實現。第三部分為實務操作部分，以草屯鎮為例，藉九二一大地震的實例，深入探討災情調查的方法，實際調查狀況及研訂災後重建的程序與計畫內容，期望成為國內都市重建計畫的範例，主要內容區分為：（1）緒論；（2）重建理論；（3）草屯鎮現況發展；（4）災情調查方法與重建程序之建立；（5）災情調查分析與重建計畫內容研訂等。
description.en: The subject will be presented in three partsPart One - (1) Literature retrospection; (2) Fundamental planning for disaster prevention; (3) An integrated disaster prevention organization.Part Two -The major contents to be addressed include (1) Formation of urban disaster cataclysm and risk; (2) Urban disaster prevention plan and regional disaster protection system planning; (3) Principles for planning disaster prevention system in urban plan; (4) Operational standards and organization for urban disaster prevention; (5) Operational guidelines for urban disaster prevention; (6) Realization and formation of trouble free urban plan.Party Three -. The major contents are (1) Introduction; (2) rehabilitation theory; (3) Current development in Tsaotun City; (4) Establishment of damage survey method and rehabilitation procedures; (5) Detail analysis of damage survey report and preparation of rehabilitation plan content.

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

name.zh: 高分子材料與複合材料

description.zh: 授課內容包括高分子及複合材料的製程、結構及性質等綜合知識，首先介紹機械混練與接枝共聚合等基本製程方法，並探討交穿網狀高分子合膠材料，以及含浸顆粒狀、纖維狀、板狀等強化高分子複合材料的結構形態與工程性質之相關原理。
description.en: Synthesis, morphology and engineering behavior of polymer and composite materials. Mechanical blend alloys, block and graft copolymers, interpenetrating polymer networks, polymer impregnated particulate, fiber and sheet-reinforce polymeric composites are emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹生物無機化學，生物無機化學主要連貫生物學與無機化學。由無機化學與生物學的基本觀念開始介紹，課程內容包括生物學中的金屬離子化學及無機化學，及金屬離子在生命組織中的功用。也介紹各種不同的物理及化學方法對含金屬生物分子、過渡金屬錯合物及電子轉移化學的研究。
description.en: This course is focused on bioinorganic chemistry. Bioinorganic chemistry is the leading discipline at the interface of inorganic chemistry and biology.  This course begins with a brief review of the fundamental concepts in inorganic chemistry and biology.  The relationship between classical inorganic chemistry and the chemistry of metal ions in biology is introduced. Discussion are focused on the function and occurrence of essential metal ions in living organisms. An overview of the use of various physical and chemical methods available for the investigation of etal-containing biomolecules are presented. Studies of transition metal complexes and electron transfer chemistry are also covered.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.

description.zh: 本課程介紹應用於醫療器材、人工器官、組織工程以及藥物釋放的相關材料。醫療器材主要包含骨科器材、人工關節、生物晶片、材料表面處理。人工器官包含人工軟骨、人工血管、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。組織工程包含支架材料、生物可分解性材料、生物反應器。藥物釋放包含高分子薄膜及目標型藥物傳送等。將進一步介紹組織工程之要素與生醫材料扮演之角色。包括材料與生物分子間的表面性質及特性。接著以細胞為主題，介紹如幹細胞生物學、細胞移動、組織環境、及組織功能基質細胞之研究等。最後介紹特殊器官與工程學上之關係，與極可能在臨床的發展與應用。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to illustrate the concepts about medical devices, artificial organs, tissue engineering and drug release technologies. The fundamentals of biomaterials will be introduced including materials, surface treatment, biological interactions, mechanical properties. The interactions between cells, biomaterials, and related applications will be illustrated in order to give an overview of tissue engineering.

description.zh: (1)	化學平衡: 包括物質本性, 化學熱力學, 化學平衡及平衡電化學。(2)	化學變化: 包括化學反應速率與動力學, 分子反應動力學, 表面反應及動態電化學。(3)	化學物質的結構與光譜學。
description.en: (1) Introduction to chemical equilibrium, including properties of matter, fundamentals of chemical thermodynamics, chemical equilibrium, and equilibrium electrochemistry.(2) Introduction to chemical change, including the rates and kinetics of chemical reactions, the molecular reactions dynamics, the properties of surface reactions, and dynamic electrochemistry.(3) Introduction to structure and spectroscopy of chemical compounds.

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: 本課程包含下列課題1.空氣清淨機構理論。2.無塵室構造、建造及確效。3.空氣過濾理論。4.無塵室設計專案。5.	論文研讀。
description.en: This course covers the following Topics.1.Theory of air cleaning Mechanism.2.Clean room configuration, construction and         verification.3.Air filtration theory.4.Paper discussion.

name.en: Special Topics on the Healthy Building

description.zh: 1. 授課目的： 現代都市規劃與建築設計除了永續環境生態之議題外，影響人體最鉅者莫過於健康環境議題，尤其在 SBS、SARS、VI、Urban Terrorism等事件之後。本課程之目的即在於傳述健康環境概念在規劃實務上之應用，並探討其作業技術內容，以培養學生健康建築之檢冊、規劃、設計與施工能力。2. 授課內容： 由基本永續都市中，各項健康議題、技術原理及其指標講授，進而指導實證操作技術實驗並撰寫論文，再而探討其實務應用。 3. 作業練習： 本學期藉由檢測與實驗操作、改善方案設計、論文報告撰寫，特別著重研討式論辯，訓練學術思辯及技術應用能力，以利學生認識健康指標及其設計應用之整體關聯性，進而建立其健康建築規劃設計能力。
description.en: After the SARS & Bird flu in these years, the"Health" issues in buildings and public space became more important. This seminar would focus on these issues, such as particles, microorganism, aerosol, magnet-electronic waves etc. and their distribution in the building.

name.en: Special Topics on  Modern Architecture in Taiwan

description.zh: 一、教學目標：培養學生對於台灣近代建築發展之認識並透過本課程使學生瞭解建築發展非侷限於單一建築技術層面尚涵蓋社會政策、人文等層面因素而演變的。二、教學內容：課程是以建築樣式的系譜、建築技術的系譜、建築家活動的系譜研究三者並重。以台灣近代建築相關的中國近代建築、日本近代建築、亞洲近代建築的進行比較之差異性。           上課內容是以時間軸為序，介紹西方建築系統的引入、日治時期第一代建築師的誕生、建築學會之成立、歷史主義建築、社會政策派、到現代主義建築的發展脈絡。
description.en: 1. Course purposesOne of the purposes of this course is to help students understand the evolution of Taiwan modern architecture. The other is to help students to realize the complex nature of architectural development, which not only relates building technology but also covers social, political, and cultural aspects.  2. Course contentsThe themes of this course focus on building types, building technologies, and the activities of architectural professionals. Chinese, Japanese, and other Asian modern architecture would be compared with Taiwan modern architecture.The contents of this course include the introduction of western architecture, the pioneer architects in Japanese colonial period, the establishment of architectural institute, historic architecture, the school of social policy, and modernism architecture.

name.en: Special selected topics on control system engineering area

description.zh: 控制相關領域專題講座
description.en: Special selected topics on control system engineering area

description.zh: 1. 變頻器2. 電力轉換器3. 直流截波器4. 電源供應器
description.en: 1. INVERTER 2. CONVERTER 3. DC CHOPPER 4. POWER SUPPLY

name.zh: 積體電路實體設計演算法
name.en: Issues Related to Manufacturing and Reliability

description.zh: 介紹VLSI設計流程及技術地圖基本演算法分割平面規劃擺置、繞線(整體繞線、細部繞線)時脈及電線/接地繞線壓縮佈置後最佳化時序建模及最佳化訊號/電源完整性其它和製作及可靠度有關之議題
description.en: Design Flow of VLSI and Technology RoadmapBasic AlgorithmsPartitionFloorplanningPlacement and Routing (Global Routing, Detail Routing)Interconnection of Clock and Power/GroundOptimization for post-processingModeling and Optimization of TimingSignal Integrity

description.zh: 1. 電力電子元件的規格 2.電力電子元件特性 3.元件與電路佈局4.元件特性與雜訊 5.元件特性與損失 6. 元件的選用與電路系統
description.en: 1. Device Specification 2.Device Characteristics 3. Component And Layout 4. Circuit Noise 5. Device Loss 6. Device Selection and Circuit Implementation.

description.zh: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 高性能混凝土之特性，材料，配比設計及試驗，品質管制，施工規範及構件行為。
description.en: This course focuses on the characteristics of high performance concrete, composition materials, mixture design and testing, quality management, construction specifications, as well as structural behavior.

description.zh: 本課程主要係研討調查方法、穩定分析、坡地災害成因、坡地監測、防災及管理配套措施、以使同學了解山坡地工程於規劃設計及施工等階段，應如何進行減少災害和實行適當管理。
description.en: This course will focus on the site investigation ,stability analysis ,failure analysis ,in-situ monitoring ,disaster prevention  ,and risk management of natural slopes. It is designed to give students a better understanding of slope protection and slope management during various stages（such as planning，design and construction）of the slope development.

description.zh: 本課程係提供防火工程有關基礎概論、設計工學手法及實務技術等理論與應用兼重的課程，以促進學生自立研討學習能力，提高教學良性互動關係，可供職場工程實務相關防火工程之重要技能與知識。內容包括：一、現行防火安全法規與性能式防火法規二、性能式防火設計基礎概論三、防止起火及火災成長有關技術四、火災探測與滅火有關技術五、控制室內外延燒擴大有關技術六、避難疏散與逃生有關技術七、煙氣控制有關技術八、構造耐火設計有關技術
description.en: The purpose of course is to provide the fundamental theory and practical technique about the fire protection engineering, encourage the establishment of self-learning ability of students and facilitate their skill and knowledge about fire protection engineering in construction job. The course covers the following subjects:1.fire safety related regulation and performance-based code in force2.fundamental theory for performance-based design3.prevention techniques about fire initiation and growth4.techniques of fire detection and extinguishment5.control techniques about interior and exterior flame-spread6.means of evacuation and escape7.techniques of smoke control8.techniques about fire resistance design of structure

description.zh: 使學生明瞭地震學基本理念及地震反應譜之運用，介紹結構物之耐震設計分析及實例探討，課程內容包括地震強度、地盤對地震之影響，耐震設計，結構物如公路、鐵路、港灣設施、橋樑、混凝土壩、拱壩及地下結構之震設計。
description.en: The main course include of earthquake intensity,influence of ground conditions on earthquake ground motion,design earthquake motion, earth pressure during earthquakes, earthquake resistance of roed,railways,bridges,concrote gravitydams, archdams and underground structures,ets.

Basic electromagnetic theory 2.Reflection and transmission of plane waves at a dielectric interface 3.The slab waveguides 4.Practical waveguide geometries 5.Optical fibers 6.Propagation, modulation, and oscillation in optical dielectric waveguide 7.Resonators and couplers 8.Distributed feedback structures

description.en: The course teaches the student Technology Management concepts and trend . The topics will be covered: (1) innovation and R&D management; (2) technology policy; (3) technology forecasting ; (4) technology strategy management ; (5) technology development and transfer; (6) technology planning and measurement.

description.zh: 熱傳學主要內容是研究由於溫度梯度所造成能量傳遞之一門學問﹐為一般冷凍、空調、食品冷藏及各類型熱交換器設計之基本知識程,其他大如各類發電廠，小如電腦微晶片散熱亦有密切關係。本課程之安排以奠定學生在熱傳方面之智能，作為未來進入冷凍、空調與能源相關學門之踏腳石。
description.en: 1.	熱傳導定律之推導2.	一維及多維的穩態與暫態熱傳分析，3.	散熱片之設計，利用數值方法解熱傳導問題，4.	對流原理之推導5.	強迫對流方面的分析及應用-層流邊界層，管道內層流熱傳6.	自然對流方面的分析及應用-管道外與封閉空間內自然對流        熱傳7.	紊流的基本性，紊流邊界層，管道內紊流8.	具相變化的熱對流:凝結與沸騰9.	熱交換器設計介紹Advanced Heat Transfer  Credit: 3 Course Outline1.	Derivation of heat conduction principles 2.	One and multi-dimentional steady and transient heat         conduction analysis3.	Heat transfer from extended surfaces, numerical heat         conduction analysis4.	Derivation of convection principles 5.	Forced convection - laminar boundary layers and     laminar heat transfer in ducts6.	Nature convection over external surfaces and in internal enclosures 7.	Fundamentals of turbulence, turbulent boundary layers, turbulent flow in ducts8.	Heat transfer with phase change: boiling and condensation9.	Introduction to heat-exchanger design

name.zh: 公共戶外家具設計研究

description.zh: 藉由戶外家具案例之分析探討公共環境與人類行為間之關係及公共戶外家具之材料、造形、人機介面、維護與安全等因素，並經由討論形成公共戶外家具之設計思維。
description.en: Case studies on outdoors furniture design to examine the relationship between open space environment and human behavior. The design factors of material, form, ergonomics, maintenance and safety will be studied. Design philosophy of outdoors furniture is to be deliberating in the discussions.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 企業在營運理念上，著重的即是符合市場導向並重視顧客，幫助經理人去設計一套通盤考量的行銷企畫，並且以顧客為導向。而這樣的課程設計，將使你增加專業行銷知識，也幫助你在做決策時更有信心，降低決策失誤的機率。藉由此研討方式預期將增進你組織的行銷效率與成果之改善。此課程也讓幫助你了解以下之概念：行銷管理之概念 、行銷系統與環境 此課程將幫助不論是否在行銷領域中發展的經理人，使他們重新審視、其行銷或顧客服務和產品發展策略，並在新的競爭市場中獲利。藉由課堂的參予學習，與同學的交流研討也將激發不同的思維與學習動力。
description.en: Seminar on Marketing  Management  About This Seminar You have heard about the "total marketing approach." This seminar is intended for the manager who wants to design an integrated marketing program that is truly customer-oriented. This program will give you the knowledge and confidence you need to make the right decisions. This is a practical, participatory, skill-oriented seminar for those who want to improve their organization's overall marketing effectiveness. This program will help managers in all areas - marketing and non-marketing - to reexamine, develop, and execute marketing, customer service, and product strategies for growth and profit in the new competitive environment. The participants will have the opportunity to share ideas with others, as they learn new ways to revitalize their organization.

description.zh: 軟性計算最佳化與傳統計算(硬性計算)最佳化的最主要差別在於軟性計算可以容忍對問題的不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性。實際上，軟性計算的主要模型係依據人類思維的模式或是生物系統的運作而發展出來的。軟性計算的主要導引基礎為:利用不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性，以獲得可追蹤，強健以及快速的解。軟性計算主要源於1965年由Zadeh所提出的模糊集理論，1973年提出的複雜系統分析與決策支援，1979年提出的軟性資料分析與機率理論。在更後期也陸續提出類神經計算與基因演算。本課程主要針對基因演算法(GA)與演進歸化法(EP/ES)進行討論，其他的方法如粒子群集(PSO)，模擬退火法(SA)也在本課程介紹之列。
description.en: The differences between Soft computing and conventional (hard) computing in that it can tolerant imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation. The key model for soft computing is the human mind or biological systems.  The guiding principle of soft computing includes: Exploit the tolerance for imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation to achieve tractability, robustness and low solution cost. The basic ideas underlying soft computing in its current incarnation have links to many earlier influences, among them Zadeh's 1965 paper on fuzzy sets; the 1973 paper on the analysis of complex systems and decision processes; and the 1979 report (1981 paper) on possibility theory and soft data analysis. The inclusion of neural computing and genetic computing in soft computing came at a later point. The main focus of this course will be in Genetic Algorithm (GA) and Evolutionary Programming/Evolutionary Strategy (EP/ES).  Other methods such as Particle Swarm Optimizat

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解數位影像之觀念及相關技術，並學習實際用高階語言實現數位影像處理之技術。內容包含：(1)介紹，(2)數位影像基礎，(3)空間域影像強化，(4)頻域影像強化，(5)影像還原，(6)彩色影像處理，(7)形態學影像處理，(8)影像分割，(9)小波與多解析處理，(10) 影像壓縮。
description.en: The goal of this course is to let students to understand the concepts and techniques used in the field of digital image processing. In addition, students will be using the high level language (C++, Java, Matlab etc.) to complete the programming of the corresponding techniques. The outline of this course is given below. (1) Introduction, (2) Digital Image Fundamentals, (3) Image Enhancement in the Spatial Domain, (4) Image Enhancement in the Frequency Domain, (5) Image Restoration, (6) Color Image Processing, (7) Morphological Image Processing, (8) Image Segmentation, (9) Wavelets and Multiresolution Processing, (10) Image Compression.

name.zh: RFID射頻辨識系統設計原理與應用
name.en: The Design Theory and Application of RFID

description.zh: 射頻辨識系統(Radio Frequency Identificatoin ; RFID )已被列為21世紀所發展的重要科技產業技術項目之一。可取代目前的條碼(Bar-code)資訊辨識系統，整合應用在門禁管理、保全管制、運輸監控、航空行李管控、圖書管理、物流管理及醫療管理等不同的相關領域上。因此本課程在使學生暸解RFID的基本設計原理及整合應用，並培養其實際設計的能力，進而能將之應用於不同的資訊領域上。
description.en: The RFID is one of the important technique industry item of that develop for 21 centuries. RFID can replacement for the current recognizes system of the bar code. It can integrate to apply in management of the control at gate, security control and conveyance supervising and control, control of the baggage of the aviation, management of the books, logistics and management of the medical treatment etc. This course is making student understand the basic design theory and integration applies at first, and training the ability of the design, then can apply RFID on different field of the information.

name.en: Control and Management of Industrial Air Pollution Sources

description.zh: 有關各種主要工業之製程，空氣污染來源，空氣污染物特性及其控制與管理方法。將配合台灣工業之現況及須求授課。本課將包括現場參觀及案例討論。
description.en: Analysis of industrial processes, estimatin f air pollutant emissions, maintenance and operation of air pollution control facitilities. Field trips to representative plants.1.Emission factors-determination and use.2.Adsorption control systems.3.Emissions in the utility industry.4.Emissions in the steel making industry.5.Emissions in the chemical/petro industry.6.Emissions in the paper indussstry.7.Emissions and air quality in the high-tech industry.8.Management of industrial Air Pollution Sources.Field trips

The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

The course covers:(1) Japanese reading and its grammar(2) Textile terminology, composite, semiconductor, and biochemistry in Japanese. (3) Japanese references of the latest scientific and technological research and development

name.en: CMOS Device Measurement and Reliability Engineering

description.zh: 一、壩址工程地質案例研究二、隧道工程案例研討。三、邊坡穩定工程案例研討。四、道路工程案例研討。五、山坡地開發工程案例研討。六、超高層建築基礎工程案例研討。七、地震分析。

description.zh: 本課程依物理處理技術、化學處理技術、生化處理技術以及高溫處理技術等四個方向介紹處理的基本原理與方法。
description.en: This class divide the mineral processing into four categories, i.e., physical process, chemical process, biochemical process, and high temperature process.  The basic principles and processing techniques that can be applied to the mineral processing will be discussed extensively.

description.zh: 主要內容在介紹並探討變量間相互關係及建立模式的技術。討論的主題以財金實證研究中常用的分析模型為主，包括銀行效率的估算，隨機邊界法，資料包絡法，以及門檻值迴歸模型，分位數迴歸，馬可夫轉換模型等。
description.en: The main issue is to investigate and model the relationship between variables. Discussion topics are related to econometric skills frequently used in financial empirical studies, including banking efficiencies, stochastic frontier analysis, data envelopment analysis, threshold model, quantile regression, and Markov switching model.

description.zh: 本課程教導學生作為一位諮詢顧問師所需具備的技巧及在今日工商社會中有效溝通的要件。本課程所涵蓋的主題為：1.管理諮詢的目的和範圍，2. 顧問師的職責和角色，3. 諮詢的過程，4. 計劃書的擬定與合約的草擬，5. 訪談與展示的技巧，及6. 手冊與研究報告的撰寫。學生必須完成一項分組個案來應証對本課程所教授的管理諮詢與溝通技巧。
description.en: This course teaches the students basic skills possessed by a management consultant and the criteria for effective communication in today's business community. Topics covered by this course are: (1) Scope and Purpose of Management Consulting, (2) Duties and Roles of A Consultant, (3) Consulting Process (4) Writing a Proposal and Drafting A Contract, (5) Interview and Presentation Skills, and (6) Development of a Manual and Report Writing. A group project is required to demonstrate student's understanding of the consulting and communication skills learned in this course.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題如：1.全球運籌之產業環境；2.全球運籌之經營模式與績效衡量；3.全球運籌之運作模式；4.全球運籌之4PL；5.全球運籌與之其他相關議題，如物流、金流及通關等；6.案例研討；7.我國全球運籌管理之未來發展。
description.en: This course includes following sections:1.Global logistics environment;2.Global logistics business model and performance   evaluation;3.Global logistics operation model;4.4PL in global logistics environment;5.Other issues related global logistics, like logistic flow   and customer;6.Case study.7.The furture trend of R.O.C. global logistics managment.

description.zh: 本課程介紹許多有關於員工甄選工具的研究。明確地說，本課程內容主要在探討這些常用甄選工具的內涵、運作的方式，以及改善甄選工具效度的方法。我們並在課程中討論許多實務上與理論上的意涵。
description.en: This present course introduces researches about a variety of personnel selection tools. Specifically, it focuses on what the selection tool is, how does it work, and how to improve its validity. We will discuss many practical and theoretical implications in this course.

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的、先前不為人知的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值，包括其在顧客關係管理的應用。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful, unknown information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed, including the value of data mining and customer relationship management. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Cluster Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹應用於工業或製程上之冷凍系統的原理設計與應用。主要內容包含: 製冰、溜冰場、食品製程、水壩建造與相關土木應用、化學工業製程、以及相關冷凍節能技術。
description.en: The main objective of this course is to introduce the principles of the refrigeration systems used in industrial applications. The topics of this course include the following: 1). Ice manufacture. 2) Ice rinks. 3) Food processing. 4) Concrete dams and subsurface soils. 5) Refrigeration in the chemical industry. 6) Energy saving technology.

description.zh: 本科目將由認識地球上太陽能之基本熱輻射理論，結合各種不同形式之太陽能源有效利用裝置，討論太陽能之有效利用方式及相關系統技術。以期在既有太陽能利用技術上，發揮更有效率的太陽能源工程系統設計，奠定未來21世紀太陽能源利用之高效率化基礎。
description.en: The aim of this course is to discuss three individual topics of more specialized nature: large PV systems, photo-voltaic under concentrated sunlight and the hydrogen economy. After completing this course the students should be able to:1. Understand the specific features of large PV systems, an    examine their economic and technical characteristics.2. Explain the advantages and disadvantages of concentrator    PV systems, and discuss their operation.3. Analyze the structure of the hydrogen economic and show    its feasibility and future   potential.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 1.無線傳播  2.通道編碼 3.峰巢概念  4.多工技術  5.通道配置 6.行動通訊系統 7.行動通訊標準
description.en: 1. Mobile Radio Propagation 2. Channel Coding  3.Cellular Concept  4. Multiple Division Techniques  5. Traffic Channel Allocation  6.Mobile Communication Systems 7.Existing Standards

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。科技管理是一門結合科技、商事及法律的課程。主要是希望透過資訊科技相關基礎知識，以整合組織內部資源，提升組織對於科技運籌帷幄的能力，進而達成組織最終目的。相較於傳統的MBA，科管所除了必須具備一般的管理知識外，更著重在於高科技產業方面相關專業知識的強化。
description.en: This is a course combining Technology, commerce and law. It aims to integrate the resources of the organization via information technology and raise the competitiveness. Comparing with MBA, except the courses of general knowledge management, Technology and Innovation Management put more emphasizes on the professional knowledge of hi-tech and related industries.

description.zh: 在本課程中我們將介紹語音辨認相關的各種概念與演算法，並討論目前最先進的系統，課程內容包括：●簡介●語音學與音素單元選擇●語音特徵參數求取  梅爾頻率倒頻譜係數 (MFCC)  音調特性曲線●聲學模型  隱藏式馬可夫模型（HMM）  類神經網路（ANN）●語言模型●搜尋演算法●語音辨認系統現況
description.en: In this course, we will introduce many concepts and algorithms related to speech recognition, and examine some state-of-the-art systems.●Overview●Phonetics and Phonetic Units●Feature Extraction  Mel-Frequency Cepstral Coefficients (MFCC)  Pitch contour●Acoustic Modeling  Hidden Markov Model (HMM)  Artificial Neural Network (ANN)●Language Modeling●Search Algorithms●State-of-the-Art Speech Recognition System

description.zh: 本課程在研討超大型積體電路佈線之實體設計工具自動化，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前實體設計之一些重要的組合性問題，並探討這些問題的各種解決方法，實體設計內容可包括下列主題：１.實體設計自動化概述２.佈線問題的組合性複雜度３.實體佈線的資料結構技術４.電路分割５.佈局、指定及平面化６.整體繞線７.實體繞線８壓縮
description.en: This course is concerned with only the physicl design automation of circuit physical layout.It Purpose is to give an overview of what are currently the mose important combinatorial problems in physical design, and to describe their solutions. The physical design covers the follwing topics:1.Introduction to physical design automation 2.The combinatorial complexity of layout problems 3.Data structure techniques for physiccal layout 4.Circuit partitioning 5. Placement, assignment, and floorplanning 6.Global routing 7.Detail3ed routing 8.Compaction

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.傅立葉分析 3.微波網路 4.向量網路分析儀 5.頻譜分析儀6.時域反射儀 7.向量信號分析儀 8.天線量測
description.en: 1.Introduction  2.Fourier Analysis 3.Microwave Network 4.Vector Network Analyzer 5.Spectrum Analyzer 6.Time Domain Reflectrometry 7.Vector Signal 8.Antenna Measurement

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生了解灰色系統的理論及原理，進而培養學生能運用該灰色系統之理論於資訊系統，控制系統，影像處理，模糊控制，類神經網路，醫學，工業，經濟及管理等領域之應用：課程內容包含：1.灰色系統介紹  2.灰色關聯度分析  3.灰色預測原理  4.灰色建模 5.灰色決策      6.灰色控制        7.專題計劃
description.en: The principle and theory of grey system is  interoduced.  Therefore, the student can apply the grey system to information system, control system,image processing, fuzzy control, neural network, medicine, industry, economy, and management,etc..  The contents of this course is : 1. The introduction of grey system. 2.Grey relational analysis. 3.The theory of grey prediction. 4. The grey modeling. 5. Grey decision 6. Grey control. 7. Final project.

description.zh: 軟性計算最佳化與傳統計算(硬性計算)最佳化的最主要差別在於軟性計算可以容忍對問題的不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性。實際上，軟性計算的主要模型係依據人類思維的模式或是生物系統的運作而發展出來的。軟性計算的主要導引基礎為:利用不確定性，不精確性，部分正確性以及類似性，以獲得可追蹤，強健以及快速的解。軟性計算主要源於1965年由Zadeh所提出的模糊集理論，1973年提出的複雜系統分析與決策支援，1979年提出的軟性資料分析與機率理論。在更後期也陸續提出類神經計算與基因演算。本課程主要針對基因演算法(GA)與演進歸化法(EP/ES)進行討論，其他的方法如粒子群集(PSO)，模擬退火法(SA)也在本課程介紹之列。
description.en: The differences between Soft computing and conventional (hard) computing in that it can tolerant imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation. The key model for soft computing is the human mind or biological systems.  The guiding principle of soft computing includes: Exploit the tolerance for imprecision, uncertainty, partial truth, and approximation to achieve tractability, robustness and low solution cost. The basic ideas underlying soft computing in its current incarnation have links to many earlier influences, among them Zadeh's 1965 paper on fuzzy sets; the 1973 paper on the analysis of complex systems and decision processes; and the 1979 report (1981 paper) on possibility theory and soft data analysis. The inclusion of neural computing and genetic computing in soft computing came at a later point. The main focus of this course will be in Genetic Algorithm (GA) and Evolutionary Programming/Evolutionary Strategy (EP/ES).  Other methods such as Particle Swarm Optimizat

description.zh: 本課程包含下列主題：網路商業環境和未來發展，網路行銷，網路公關，網路商店之經營，線上廣告及交易。
description.en: This course includes following topics: network commerce environment and future development, network marketing, network PR, network store management, on-line advertisement and business, and network business safty.

description.zh: 本課程在透過研討，讓學生瞭解行銷的觀念和趨勢。主要包括以下課題：（1）消費者行為（2）市場區隔（3）產品策略（4）行銷通路（5）網路行銷（6）促銷（6）關係行銷。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹薄膜製作有關的基礎理論與技術。講述內容包括真空技術，薄膜基礎，薄膜製作技術，蝕刻技術，薄膜評估方法以及薄膜技術的應用等。讓學生認識薄膜在高科技產業上的應用與其重要性，製作薄膜的方法與技術以及其未來的發展。
description.en: This course is a special topics of Thin films technology and Thin film materials science. 2. Vacuum science and technology 3. Thin film evaporation processes 4. Discharge, plasma, and ion-surface interaction 5. Plasma and ion beam processing of thin films 6. Chemical vapor deposition 7. Substrate surfaces and thin film nucleation 8. Film structure 9. Characterization of thin films and surface 10. Interdiffusion, reactions, and transformations in thin films 11. Mechanical properties of thin films.

description.zh: 資料探勘是從大量資料中尋找有用的、先前不為人知的資訊，是一個跨越統計、資料庫和人工智慧的學門。本課程著重在從資料庫的觀點來看資料探勘的意義，並深入探討幾種資料探勘功能及其技術，最後並以實例討論來驗證資料探勘的應用價值，包括其在顧客關係管理的應用。探討議題包括資料探勘概念、資料探勘功能、資料探勘步驟、資料倉儲、決策樹分析集群分析、關聯分析與購物籃分析等。
description.en: The data mining (DM), which involves in Statistics, Database and Artificial Intelligence fields, prospects to seek Useful, unknown information from a great deal of data. This course emphasizes at the view of the database, besides go deeply into several data mining techniques. Finally, the practical case studies will also be discussed, including the value of data mining and customer relationship management. The topic includes the concept of DM, the function of DM, the step of DM, data warehouse, Decision Trees Analysis, Cluster Analysis, Association Rule and Basket Analyzes, etc.

description.zh: 1.無線通訊系統簡介2.蜂巢式行動通訊系統概念介紹3.無線電通訊的傳播原理4.行動通訊之調變技術5.行動通訊之多工技術6.天線﹑多元性與系統分析7.行動通訊之數位與語音編碼8.無線網路系統9.行動通訊之現有規格與未來發展
description.en: 1.Introduction to wireless communication systems2.An Overview of cellular systems3.Mobile Radis Propagation(path loss,multipath     fasing,propagation models)4.Modulation techniques for mobile communications5.Multiple access techniques for mobile communications6.Antenna,dirersity and link analysis7.Channel coding and speech coding8.Wireless networking9.Wireless systems standards and further developments

name.zh: 資訊技術在醫學工程之應用
name.en: Applies Information Technologies to Medical Engineering

description.zh: 1.醫療資訊標準 2.醫療儀器設計 3.遠距醫療系統 4.遠距照護系統 5.數位訊號處理在醫工之應用 6.PACS的設計與規則 7.輔助設計
description.en: 1.Medical Informations Standards 2.Medical Instrument Design 3.Telemedicine System 4.Telecare System 5.Digital Image Processing in Medical Engineering 6.Design & Plan of Picture Achieving and Communications System 7.Help System Design for Disable

description.zh: 本課程包含：國際經濟環境，文化與政治差異，國際行銷組織，行銷組合決策，及國際行銷資訊系統。
description.en: This course includes international economic environment, culture and political differentiation, international marketing organization, marketing combinational decision, and international marketing information system.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討全球運籌管理之相關議題如：1.全球運籌之產業環境；2.全球運籌之經營模式與績效衡量；3.全球運籌之運作模式；4.全球運籌之4PL；5.全球運籌與之其他相關議題，如物流、金流及通關等；6.案例研討；7.我國全球運籌管理之未來發展。
description.en: This course includes following sections:1.Global logistics environment;2.Global logistics business model and performance   evaluation;3.Global logistics operation model;4.4PL in global logistics environment;5.Other issues related global logistics, like logistic flow   and customer;6.Case study.7.The furture trend of R.O.C. global logistics managment.

description.zh: 本課程將深入探討一項或數項當今之通訊網路技術。採討的主題如衛星及行動網路，無線及隨意網路，光學網路，網路協定設計，網路管理技術，交換及路由系統等。
description.en: Thorough treatment of one or more special topics in state-of-the-art communication network technologies such as mobile/satellite networks, wireless/ad hoc neetworks,optical networks,network protocol designs,network management techniques and switching/routing systems.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹軟體專案管理與軟體建構管理之概念與相關進行活動。課程所涵蓋的內容包括有：專案管理概念介紹－軟體專案生命週期、物件導向軟體開發；專案管理概念－工作、活動、工作包、工作細分結構、組織結構、軟體專案管理計畫；專案管理活動－規劃、組織、控制、結案；建構管理概念介紹－建構項目、建構與版本、改變需求、軟體發布、分支與改變管理；專案與建構管理工具介紹。課程的實施，將兼顧理論與實務並重。透過實際執行一軟體開發專案，學習者將有充分機會練習專案管理之各項活動並熟悉工具之使用。
description.en: This course discusses issues in software project management and software configuration management, as listed below. Overview of Project Management- software project life cycle, object-oriented software development; Project management concepts- task, activity, work package, work breakdown structure, organization structure, software project management plan; Project management activities- planning, organizing, controlling, terminating; Concepts of configuration management- configuration items, configuration and version, change request, release, branch, change management; Introduction to project management and configuration management tools. Learners will practice the skills by completing a software development project in the course.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的是提供學生對於都市政策規劃、都市設計與方案實施等有關專業領域更深入研究之機會。專題多元而深入，諸如以下之專題皆可作為討論之主題：1.	地方發展計畫、與管理之理論與實務2.	資源規劃與管理3.	環境倫理4.	交通政策與規劃5.	土地使用規劃6.	公共設施建設7.	國外規劃比較8.	住宅政策9.	鄉村規劃10.	景觀規劃11.	綠社區12.	敷地與不動產開發管理13.	都市理論研究14.	當代規劃設計思潮與評論
description.en: The aim of the course is to provide an opportunity for in-depth study of urban specialized areas related to policy -making, urban planning and design, and implementation professional studies. The following topic areas will be offered as options for study:1.	Theories and practices in local planning, development and management2.	Resource planning and management3.	Environmental ethics4.	Transport policy and planning5.	Land use planning 6.	Public facilities construction7.	Comparative Overseas Planning8.	Housing Policy9.	Countryside Planning10.	Landscape Planning11.	Green communities12.	Site and property development13.	Urban theory research14.	Contemporary thought and commentary on planning and design

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 本課程將探討各種識別之技巧，包含：使用距離及相似性之分類之方法，分群之方法，使用監督學習及非監督學習之類神經網路，特徵萃取之方法，文法式圖形識別法，及應用範例。
description.en: This course covers the following topics; classification by distance functions and likelihood functions,clustering algorithms,neural networks with supervised and unsupervised learning, issues of fdature extraction, syntactic pattern recognition, and examples of applications.

description.zh: 本課程包含機率與隨機程序的基礎原理,如機率量測,隨機變數,大數法則,隨機程序,穩態隨機程序及其特性. 本門課程為研究所在通訊及控制組之基本課程.
description.en: This course contains the basic theories in probabaility and random processes. It includes probability measures,random variables,law of large number,random processes and stationaryprocesses.The course is a basic course in field of communications and controls in graduate school.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計積体電路佈局,進而能培養學生具有設計積体電路佈局的能力,課程內容包念： 1. SOC設計介紹 2. SOC設計流程與工具 3. 以平台為基礎的SOC設計 4. 軟體應體共同設計 5. SIP設計介紹 6. 嵌入式RTOS 7. 混合模式設計 8. SOC測試與驗證 9. 專題介紹
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of advanced FPGA system. Therefore, the student has the design capability of advanced FPGA system. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction to SOC Design 2. SOC Design Flow & Tools 3. Platforms Based SOC Design 4. Hardware/Software Co-design 5. Introduction to SIP Design 6. Embedded RTOS 7. Mixed-mode Design 8. SOC Testing & Verification 9. Case Study

description.zh: 本課程的主要目標是提供修課者對多變量方法的理論了解與軟體工具，作為協助專業計畫或論文研究有關於多變量資料的分析。本課程內容為Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Principal Components, Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Clustering 等。課程內容除了理論介紹外，期刊論文應用的例子是本課程教材的另一特色。成績以專案報告、期中、期末考為評分依據。
description.en: Introduction & SAS,Matrix Algebra & Random Vectors, Comparisons on Several Multivariate Means, Multivariate Linear Regression Models, Journal paper discussion-Multiple Regression, Principal Components, Journal paper, iscussion-PCAFactor Analysis, Journal paper discussion-Factor Analysis, Canonical Correlation Analysis, Journal paper discussion-Canonical Correlation Analysis, Discrimination & Classification, Journal paper discussion-Discrimination & Classification, Clustering,Project

description.zh: 對無機化合物之結構，化學性質等，利用量子化學，群論及結晶化學等加以探討。以配合天然礦物之形成，產狀，地球化學及環境化學等學科之授課內容。
description.en: The chemical structure and properties of inorganic compounds, which are useful for the following courses: the forming and occurrence of minerals, earth and environmental chemistry, will be discussed by using quantum chemistry, group theory and crystallography.

description.zh: 本課程著重於資源再生分選廠的設計與規劃，如何選擇各項機械，並利用電腦程式輔助以達成建廠設計的知識。
description.en: The objective of this class is to teach student how to design a process plant to conduct industrial waste recycling and reutilization.  The process unit selection and computer modeling and simulation will also be included in the design process.

description.zh: 本課程主要敘述數位語音訊號的處理技術及語音相關應用。討論的課題主要包括語音分析的基本聲學原理如發音模型與語音特徵分析，以及語音編碼、語音合成、語音辨認等重要應用。
description.en: This course is intended to introduce the fundamentals of speech signal processing and related applications. The topics it will address include speech production model, extraction and evaluation of speech features, basic principles of speech analysis and synthesis, speech coding, and speech recognition, etc.

description.zh: 1. 太陽能源利用2. 光纖傳輸原理3. PN及MS接面原理4. 各種太陽電池5. 太陽電池的製造與設計
description.en: 1. Applications of solar energy2. Fiber Optic transmission3. PN junctions4. Metal-semiconductor junctions5. Solar cells6. Fabrication and design of solar cells

description.zh: l 本課程所為研究所課程，內容包括狀態控間分析，頻域分析，現代數位控制理論分析及控制器設計，應用實例介紹。
description.en: l This course is designed mainly for senior-graduate students. The objective of this course is to introduce some fundamental concepts of digital control, such as state space approach, frequency domain approach, and modern control theory. The design and applications of the digital controllers are also included.

description.zh: 先修課程：半導體元件物理﹙4005032﹚。本課程著重於IC製程技術之學習。課程內容包括：IC絕緣技術、模組製程技術、導線技術、整合工程技術、SOC技術及半導體奈米元件技術等。
description.en: A study on advanced IC process. The contents cover IC isolation technology, module process, interconnection line process, process integration, SOC applications and CMOS nano device engineering etc.

description.zh: 本課程針對不同應用主題，諸如人事、財務、物料安全、品質、進度、環保等進行管理科學之介紹，並進行應用研究探討，此外有關作業研究、系統模擬等分析方法亦將於課程中詳加介紹。
description.en: This cause will introduce the management science and application of personnel, finance, safety, material, quality,schedule and environmental protection. Meanwhile,the analysis methods of activity research and system simulation will also be dicussed.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標為加強同學對細胞構造，生物活性以及分子間交互作用的認識。課程內容以真核細胞為探討的主題，動物細胞為主並輔以酵母菌與植物領域的重要研究成果。授課內容將依不同主題由基本概念到最新進展做介紹。除了基本的細胞構造與功能之外，本課程亦會介紹遺傳資訊到蛋白質作用，細胞訊息傳遞與細胞各種調控機制等概念。以期同學在分子層次上對細胞整體運作有進一步的認知。
description.en: The major goal of the course, Cell Biology, is to reinforce the understanding of architectures, biological activities and molecular interactions in a living cell. This course focuses on the eukaryotic system, especially the animal cells and the important findings discovered from yeasts and plants. The lectures will be sorted by the topics and each one will cover the basic concepts and the latest events in that field. In addition to the relevance between architecture and function in a cell, concepts of genetic information to protein, cell signaling and regulation are also included in this course to help students to get an overview of the organization and features of the cell with the molecular biology aspect.

description.zh: 課程上設計了兩大部分　　一為生物技術產業概論-基礎；另一為生物技術產業概論-進階。　　基礎部分以分析化學為切入點，再進入蛋白質與酵素之生化領域，再擴展到各種大小分子的整合應用，最後引進細胞與組織工程的建構；接下來再以各重要特化領域，進行分項介紹，包含特用化學品、食品科學、醫療藥品與植物科學，期待學員們能確時掌握各項領域之技術與應用。　　進階部分以最具發展潛力之生物工業、植物食品、生物晶片、基因體學、蛋白質體學、幹細胞為六大標的，各分為Part A：介紹各產業中相對應用之相關生物技術；Part B：針對各型產業之市場進行介紹與討論；Part C：進行生物技術產業案例之專題討論，務求學員由實務中得到知識也獲取寶貴經驗，以面對迷人又深具挑戰的生物科技產業。
description.en: The course is divided into two sections: (1) Fundamental of industry of biotechnology and (2) Advance of industry of biotechnology.Section (1) gives a general introduction from the aspect of analytical chemistry that covers protein chemistry and enzymology, micro- and macromolecule, tissue engineering, fine chemicals, food science, pharmaceutical and botanical sciences. Section (2) covers topics on bioindustry, nutritional science, bio-chip development, proteomics, protein science and stem cell research, in which the content is divided into three subparts namely, Part A An overview of technologies used in each topic; Part B An introduction to markets and trends; Part C Case study. We hope all participants will gain insight on today's biotechnology and get ready to meet future challenges.

name.zh: 消費者行為與產品設計

description.zh: 介紹消費者行為與產品設計之關係, 研究市場趨勢與消費者之消費相關之需求、心理、行為、及文化特性, 以進行產品開發之規劃並訂定設計策略。
description.en: Introduction to the relationships between consumer behavior and product design. The trends of markets and the consumption characteristics are studied to make the plan of product development and set up the design strategy.

description.zh: 邀請校內外學者專家至校針對某一專長領域進行專題演講，讓學生藉由聽講及心得報告之寫作，開展視野，並與時代之脈動相契合。(在職專班)
description.en: Invited speakers from different disciplines give speech in their specialized area. Thus students can broaden their eyesight and also keep updating the technology and its applications of the generation.

description.zh: 精確度、重覆性、精密度及解析度等、彈性變形及動態特性、背隙摩擦及動態特性、系統補償、精密機構及動態分析。
description.en: Accuracy, Repeatability, Precision and Resolution; Elastic Deformation, Backlash, Friction and their Dynamic Properties; System Compensation; precision Mechanisms and Dynamic Analysis.

description.zh: 面對地球資源逐漸枯竭的當下, 投入大量生產物量的建築興建模式必須有所變革, 才能因應減低環境負荷的需求。目前建築資源能否有效地再利用的課題在各先進國家受到相當多的矚目。故本課程以介紹海外各種再利用的案例手法為出發點, 並配合台灣地區國情探討建築再利用的可能性與面臨課題。專題討論內容■ 建築再利用之導論與定義   ■ 建築再利用的主要理論與手法   ■ 歐洲及日本的既有地區性集合住宅群的再生實例探討           ■ 建築填充體的更新         ■ 建物內的隔間改造與擴充, 建築                               主體的增建與減建               ■ 外部裝修的保存與再利用   ■ 建築資材的他用途轉用         ■ 建築再利用與都市更新     ■ 建築再利用於台灣面臨的多面向課題(法令與市場)
description.en: The scope of this curriculum encompasses the theories of the management of building projects, including:1. Introduction(The definition of Reuse, Reduce and Recycle).2. Main methodologies and evaluating tools of building-reuse.3. Case study: Mass housing renewal in European countries & Japan.4.Renewal operation of infill-based building components: Case study on Partitions, kitchens& Sanitary spaces5. Relation between Building renewal and urban tissue.
